2377 
2378  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay,nbands),intent(out) :: htrb
2379 
2380  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay), intent(out) ::
2381  & totuflux, totdflux, totuclfl, totdclfl
2382 
2383 ! --- locals:
2384  real (kind=kind_phys), parameter :: rec_6 = 0.166667
2385 
2386  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay,nbands) :: clrurad, &
2387  & clrdrad, toturad, totdrad
2388 
2389  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay) :: gassrcu, totsrcu, &
2390  & trngas, efclrfr, rfdelp
2391  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay) :: fnet, fnetc
2392 
2393  real (kind=kind_phys) :: totsrcd, gassrcd, tblind, odepth, odtot, &
2394  & odcld, atrtot, atrgas, reflct, totfac, gasfac, flxfac, &
2395  & plfrac, blay, bbdgas, bbdtot, bbugas, bbutot, dplnku, &
2396  & dplnkd, radtotu, radclru, radtotd, radclrd, rad0, &
2397  & clfr, trng, gasu
2398 
2399  integer :: ittot, itgas, ib, ig, k
2400 !
2401 !===> ... begin here
2402 !
2403  do ib = 1, nbands
2404  do k = 0, nlay
2405  toturad(k,ib) = f_zero
2406  totdrad(k,ib) = f_zero
2407  clrurad(k,ib) = f_zero
2408  clrdrad(k,ib) = f_zero
2409  enddo
2410  enddo
2411 
2412  do k = 0, nlay
2413  totuflux(k) = f_zero
2414  totdflux(k) = f_zero
2415  totuclfl(k) = f_zero
2416  totdclfl(k) = f_zero
2417  enddo
2418 
2419 ! --- ... loop over all g-points
2420 
2421  do ig = 1, ngptlw
2422  ib = ngb(ig)
2423 
2424  radtotd = f_zero
2425  radclrd = f_zero
2426 
2428 
2429 ! --- ... downward radiative transfer loop.
2430 
2431  do k = nlay, 1, -1
2432 !!\n - clear sky, gases contribution
2433 ! --- ... clear sky, gases contribution
2434 
2435  odepth = max( f_zero, secdif(ib)*tautot(ig,k) )
2436  if (odepth <= 0.06) then
2437  atrgas = odepth - 0.5*odepth*odepth
2438  trng = f_one - atrgas
2439  gasfac = rec_6 * odepth
2440  else
2441  tblind = odepth / (bpade + odepth)
2442  itgas = tblint*tblind + 0.5
2443  trng = exp_tbl(itgas)
2444  atrgas = f_one - trng
2445  gasfac = tfn_tbl(itgas)
2446  odepth = tau_tbl(itgas)
2447  endif
2448 
2449  plfrac = fracs(ig,k)
2450  blay = pklay(ib,k)
2451 
2452  dplnku = pklev(ib,k ) - blay
2453  dplnkd = pklev(ib,k-1) - blay
2454  bbdgas = plfrac * (blay + dplnkd*gasfac)
2455  bbugas = plfrac * (blay + dplnku*gasfac)
2456  gassrcd= bbdgas * atrgas
2457  gassrcu(k)= bbugas * atrgas
2458  trngas(k) = trng
2459 !!\n - total sky, gases+clouds contribution
2460 ! --- ... total sky, gases+clouds contribution
2461 
2462  clfr = cldfrc(k)
2463  if (clfr >= eps) then
2464 !!\n - cloudy layer
2465 ! --- ... cloudy layer
2466 
2467  odcld = secdif(ib) * taucld(ib,k)
2468  efclrfr(k) = f_one-(f_one - exp(-odcld))*clfr
2469  odtot = odepth + odcld
2470  if (odtot < 0.06) then
2471  totfac = rec_6 * odtot
2472  atrtot = odtot - 0.5*odtot*odtot
2473  else
2474  tblind = odtot / (bpade + odtot)
2475  ittot = tblint*tblind + 0.5
2476  totfac = tfn_tbl(ittot)
2477  atrtot = f_one - exp_tbl(ittot)
2478  endif
2479 
2480  bbdtot = plfrac * (blay + dplnkd*totfac)
2481  bbutot = plfrac * (blay + dplnku*totfac)
2482  totsrcd= bbdtot * atrtot
2483  totsrcu(k)= bbutot * atrtot
2484 
2485 ! --- ... total sky radiance
2486  radtotd = radtotd*trng*efclrfr(k) + gassrcd &
2487  & + clfr*(totsrcd - gassrcd)
2488  totdrad(k-1,ib) = totdrad(k-1,ib) + radtotd
2489 
2490 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
2491  radclrd = radclrd*trng + gassrcd
2492  clrdrad(k-1,ib) = clrdrad(k-1,ib) + radclrd
2493 
2494  else
2495 ! --- ... clear layer
2496 
2497 ! --- ... total sky radiance
2498  radtotd = radtotd*trng + gassrcd
2499  totdrad(k-1,ib) = totdrad(k-1,ib) + radtotd
2500 
2501 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
2502  radclrd = radclrd*trng + gassrcd
2503  clrdrad(k-1,ib) = clrdrad(k-1,ib) + radclrd
2504 
2505  endif ! end if_clfr_block
2506 
2507  enddo ! end do_k_loop
2508 
2511 ! --- ... spectral emissivity & reflectance
2512 ! include the contribution of spectrally varying longwave emissivity
2513 ! and reflection from the surface to the upward radiative transfer.
2514 ! note: spectral and Lambertian reflection are identical for the
2515 ! diffusivity angle flux integration used here.
2516 
2517  reflct = f_one - semiss(ib)
2518  rad0 = semiss(ib) * fracs(ig,1) * pklay(ib,0)
2520 ! --- ... total sky radiance
2521  radtotu = rad0 + reflct*radtotd
2522  toturad(0,ib) = toturad(0,ib) + radtotu
2524 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
2525  radclru = rad0 + reflct*radclrd
2526  clrurad(0,ib) = clrurad(0,ib) + radclru
2528 ! --- ... upward radiative transfer
2529 
2530  do k = 1, nlay
2531  clfr = cldfrc(k)
2532  trng = trngas(k)
2533  gasu = gassrcu(k)
2534 
2535  if (clfr >= eps) then
2536 ! --- ... cloudy layer
2537 
2538 ! --- ... total sky radiance
2539  radtotu = radtotu*trng*efclrfr(k) + gasu &
2540  & + clfr*(totsrcu(k) - gasu)
2541  toturad(k,ib) = toturad(k,ib) + radtotu
2542 
2543 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
2544  radclru = radclru*trng + gasu
2545  clrurad(k,ib) = clrurad(k,ib) + radclru
2546 
2547  else
2548 ! --- ... clear layer
2549 
2550 ! --- ... total sky radiance
2551  radtotu = radtotu*trng + gasu
2552  toturad(k,ib) = toturad(k,ib) + radtotu
2553 
2554 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
2555  radclru = radclru*trng + gasu
2556  clrurad(k,ib) = clrurad(k,ib) + radclru
2557 
2558  endif ! end if_clfr_block
2559 
2560  enddo ! end do_k_loop
2561 
2562  enddo ! end do_ig_loop
2563 
2566 ! --- ... process longwave output from band for total and clear streams.
2567 ! calculate upward, downward, and net flux.
2568 
2569  flxfac = wtdiff * fluxfac
2570 
2571  do k = 0, nlay
2572  do ib = 1, nbands
2573  totuflux(k) = totuflux(k) + toturad(k,ib)
2574  totdflux(k) = totdflux(k) + totdrad(k,ib)
2575  totuclfl(k) = totuclfl(k) + clrurad(k,ib)
2576  totdclfl(k) = totdclfl(k) + clrdrad(k,ib)
2577  enddo
2578 
2579  totuflux(k) = totuflux(k) * flxfac
2580  totdflux(k) = totdflux(k) * flxfac
2581  totuclfl(k) = totuclfl(k) * flxfac
2582  totdclfl(k) = totdclfl(k) * flxfac
2583  enddo
2584 
2585 ! --- ... calculate net fluxes and heating rates
2586  fnet(0) = totuflux(0) - totdflux(0)
2587 
2588  do k = 1, nlay
2589  rfdelp(k) = heatfac / delp(k)
2590  fnet(k) = totuflux(k) - totdflux(k)
2591  htr(k) = (fnet(k-1) - fnet(k)) * rfdelp(k)
2592  enddo
2593 
2594 !! --- ... optional clear sky heating rates
2595  if ( lhlw0 ) then
2596  fnetc(0) = totuclfl(0) - totdclfl(0)
2597 
2598  do k = 1, nlay
2599  fnetc(k) = totuclfl(k) - totdclfl(k)
2600  htrcl(k) = (fnetc(k-1) - fnetc(k)) * rfdelp(k)
2601  enddo
2602  endif
2603 
2604 !! --- ... optional spectral band heating rates
2605  if ( lhlwb ) then
2606  do ib = 1, nbands
2607  fnet(0) = (toturad(0,ib) - totdrad(0,ib)) * flxfac
2608 
2609  do k = 1, nlay
2610  fnet(k) = (toturad(k,ib) - totdrad(k,ib)) * flxfac
2611  htrb(k,ib) = (fnet(k-1) - fnet(k)) * rfdelp(k)
2612  enddo
2613  enddo
2614  endif
2615 
2616 ! ..................................
2617  end subroutine rtrn
2618 ! ----------------------------------
2619 
2643 ! ----------------------------------
2644  subroutine rtrnmr
2645  & ( semiss,delp,cldfrc,taucld,tautot,pklay,pklev, ! --- inputs
2646  & fracs,secdif, nlay,nlp1,
2647  & totuflux,totdflux,htr, totuclfl,totdclfl,htrcl, htrb ! --- outputs:
2648  & )
2649 
2650 ! =================== program usage description =================== !
2651 ! !
2652 ! purpose: compute the upward/downward radiative fluxes, and heating !
2653 ! rates for both clear or cloudy atmosphere. clouds are assumed as in !
2654 ! maximum-randomly overlaping in a vertical colum. !
2655 ! !
2656 ! subprograms called: none !
2657 ! !
2658 ! ==================== defination of variables ==================== !
2659 ! !
2660 ! inputs: -size- !
2661 ! semiss - real, lw surface emissivity nbands!
2662 ! delp - real, layer pressure thickness (mb) nlay !
2663 ! cldfrc - real, layer cloud fraction 0:nlp1 !
2664 ! taucld - real, layer cloud opt depth nbands,nlay!
2665 ! tautot - real, total optical depth (gas+aerosols) ngptlw,nlay!
2666 ! pklay - real, integrated planck func at lay temp nbands*0:nlay!
2667 ! pklev - real, integrated planck func at lev temp nbands*0:nlay!
2668 ! fracs - real, planck fractions ngptlw,nlay!
2669 ! secdif - real, secant of diffusivity angle nbands!
2670 ! nlay - integer, number of vertical layers 1 !
2671 ! nlp1 - integer, number of vertical levels (interfaces) 1 !
2672 ! !
2673 ! outputs: !
2674 ! totuflux- real, total sky upward flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
2675 ! totdflux- real, total sky downward flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
2676 ! htr - real, total sky heating rate (k/sec or k/day) nlay !
2677 ! totuclfl- real, clear sky upward flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
2678 ! totdclfl- real, clear sky downward flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
2679 ! htrcl - real, clear sky heating rate (k/sec or k/day) nlay !
2680 ! htrb - real, spectral band lw heating rate (k/day) nlay*nbands!
2681 ! !
2682 ! module veriables: !
2683 ! ngb - integer, band index for each g-value ngptlw!
2684 ! fluxfac - real, conversion factor for fluxes (pi*2.e4) 1 !
2685 ! heatfac - real, conversion factor for heating rates (g/cp*1e-2) 1 !
2686 ! tblint - real, conversion factor for look-up tbl (float(ntbl) 1 !
2687 ! bpade - real, pade approx constant (1/0.278) 1 !
2688 ! wtdiff - real, weight for radiance to flux conversion 1 !
2689 ! ntbl - integer, dimension of look-up tables 1 !
2690 ! tau_tbl - real, clr-sky opt dep lookup table 0:ntbl !
2691 ! exp_tbl - real, transmittance lookup table 0:ntbl !
2692 ! tfn_tbl - real, tau transition function 0:ntbl !
2693 ! !
2694 ! local variables: !
2695 ! itgas - integer, index for gases contribution look-up table 1 !
2696 ! ittot - integer, index for gases plus clouds look-up table 1 !
2697 ! reflct - real, surface reflectance 1 !
2698 ! atrgas - real, gaseous absorptivity 1 !
2699 ! atrtot - real, gaseous and cloud absorptivity 1 !
2700 ! odcld - real, cloud optical depth 1 !
2701 ! odepth - real, optical depth of gaseous only 1 !
2702 ! odtot - real, optical depth of gas and cloud 1 !
2703 ! gasfac - real, gas-only pade factor, used for planck fn 1 !
2704 ! totfac - real, gas+cld pade factor, used for planck fn 1 !
2705 ! bbdgas - real, gas-only planck function for downward rt 1 !
2706 ! bbugas - real, gas-only planck function for upward rt 1 !
2707 ! bbdtot - real, gas and cloud planck function for downward rt 1 !
2708 ! bbutot - real, gas and cloud planck function for upward rt 1 !
2709 ! gassrcu- real, upwd source radiance due to gas only nlay!
2710 ! totsrcu- real, upwd source radiance due to gas + cld nlay!
2711 ! gassrcd- real, dnwd source radiance due to gas only 1 !
2712 ! totsrcd- real, dnwd source radiance due to gas + cld 1 !
2713 ! radtotu- real, spectrally summed total sky upwd radiance 1 !
2714 ! radclru- real, spectrally summed clear sky upwd radiance 1 !
2715 ! radtotd- real, spectrally summed total sky dnwd radiance 1 !
2716 ! radclrd- real, spectrally summed clear sky dnwd radiance 1 !
2717 ! toturad- real, total sky upward radiance by layer 0:nlay*nbands!
2718 ! clrurad- real, clear sky upward radiance by layer 0:nlay*nbands!
2719 ! totdrad- real, total sky downward radiance by layer 0:nlay*nbands!
2720 ! clrdrad- real, clear sky downward radiance by layer 0:nlay*nbands!
2721 ! fnet - real, net longwave flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
2722 ! fnetc - real, clear sky net longwave flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
2723 ! !
2724 ! !
2725 ! ******************************************************************* !
2726 ! original code description !
2727 ! !
2728 ! original version: e. j. mlawer, et al. rrtm_v3.0 !
2729 ! revision for gcms: michael j. iacono; october, 2002 !
2730 ! revision for f90: michael j. iacono; june, 2006 !
2731 ! !
2732 ! this program calculates the upward fluxes, downward fluxes, and !
2733 ! heating rates for an arbitrary clear or cloudy atmosphere. the input !
2734 ! to this program is the atmospheric profile, all Planck function !
2735 ! information, and the cloud fraction by layer. a variable diffusivity!
2736 ! angle (secdif) is used for the angle integration. bands 2-3 and 5-9 !
2737 ! use a value for secdif that varies from 1.50 to 1.80 as a function !
2738 ! of the column water vapor, and other bands use a value of 1.66. the !
2739 ! gaussian weight appropriate to this angle (wtdiff=0.5) is applied !
2740 ! here. note that use of the emissivity angle for the flux integration!
2741 ! can cause errors of 1 to 4 W/m2 within cloudy layers. !
2742 ! clouds are treated with a maximum-random cloud overlap method. !
2743 ! !
2744 ! ******************************************************************* !
2745 ! ====================== end of description block ================= !
2746 
2747 ! --- inputs:
2748  integer, intent(in) :: nlay, nlp1
2749 
2750  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlp1), intent(in) :: cldfrc
2751  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nbands), intent(in) :: semiss,
2752  & secdif
2753  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay), intent(in) :: delp
2754 
2755  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nbands,nlay),intent(in):: taucld
2756  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(ngptlw,nlay),intent(in):: fracs,
2757  & tautot
2758 
2759  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nbands,0:nlay), intent(in) ::
2760  & pklev, pklay
2761 
2762 ! --- outputs:
2763  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay), intent(out) :: htr, htrcl
2764 
2765  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay,nbands),intent(out) :: htrb
2766 
2767  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay), intent(out) ::
2768  & totuflux, totdflux, totuclfl, totdclfl
2769 
2770 ! --- locals:
2771  real (kind=kind_phys), parameter :: rec_6 = 0.166667
2772 
2773  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay,nbands) :: clrurad, &
2774  & clrdrad, toturad, totdrad
2775 
2776  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay) :: gassrcu, totsrcu, &
2777  & trngas, trntot, rfdelp
2778  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay) :: fnet, fnetc
2779 
2780  real (kind=kind_phys) :: totsrcd, gassrcd, tblind, odepth, odtot, &
2781  & odcld, atrtot, atrgas, reflct, totfac, gasfac, flxfac, &
2782  & plfrac, blay, bbdgas, bbdtot, bbugas, bbutot, dplnku, &
2783  & dplnkd, radtotu, radclru, radtotd, radclrd, rad0, rad, &
2784  & totradd, clrradd, totradu, clrradu, fmax, fmin, rat1, rat2,&
2785  & radmod, clfr, trng, trnt, gasu, totu
2786 
2787  integer :: ittot, itgas, ib, ig, k
2788 
2789 ! dimensions for cloud overlap adjustment
2790  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlp1) :: faccld1u, faccld2u, &
2791  & facclr1u, facclr2u, faccmb1u, faccmb2u
2792  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay) :: faccld1d, faccld2d, &
2793  & facclr1d, facclr2d, faccmb1d, faccmb2d
2794 
2795  logical :: lstcldu(nlay), lstcldd(nlay)
2796 !
2797 !===> ... begin here
2798 !
2799  do k = 1, nlp1
2800  faccld1u(k) = f_zero
2801  faccld2u(k) = f_zero
2802  facclr1u(k) = f_zero
2803  facclr2u(k) = f_zero
2804  faccmb1u(k) = f_zero
2805  faccmb2u(k) = f_zero
2806  enddo
2807 
2808  lstcldu(1) = cldfrc(1) > eps
2809  rat1 = f_zero
2810  rat2 = f_zero
2811 
2812  do k = 1, nlay-1
2813 
2814  lstcldu(k+1) = cldfrc(k+1)>eps .and. cldfrc(k)<=eps
2815 
2816  if (cldfrc(k) > eps) then
2818 ! --- ... maximum/random cloud overlap
2819 
2820  if (cldfrc(k+1) >= cldfrc(k)) then
2821  if (lstcldu(k)) then
2822  if (cldfrc(k) < f_one) then
2823  facclr2u(k+1) = (cldfrc(k+1) - cldfrc(k)) &
2824  & / (f_one - cldfrc(k))
2825  endif
2826  facclr2u(k) = f_zero
2827  faccld2u(k) = f_zero
2828  else
2829  fmax = max(cldfrc(k), cldfrc(k-1))
2830  if (cldfrc(k+1) > fmax) then
2831  facclr1u(k+1) = rat2
2832  facclr2u(k+1) = (cldfrc(k+1) - fmax)/(f_one - fmax)
2833  elseif (cldfrc(k+1) < fmax) then
2834  facclr1u(k+1) = (cldfrc(k+1) - cldfrc(k)) &
2835  & / (cldfrc(k-1) - cldfrc(k))
2836  else
2837  facclr1u(k+1) = rat2
2838  endif
2839  endif
2840 
2841  if (facclr1u(k+1)>f_zero .or. facclr2u(k+1)>f_zero) then
2842  rat1 = f_one
2843  rat2 = f_zero
2844  else
2845  rat1 = f_zero
2846  rat2 = f_zero
2847  endif
2848  else
2849  if (lstcldu(k)) then
2850  faccld2u(k+1) = (cldfrc(k) - cldfrc(k+1)) / cldfrc(k)
2851  facclr2u(k) = f_zero
2852  faccld2u(k) = f_zero
2853  else
2854  fmin = min(cldfrc(k), cldfrc(k-1))
2855  if (cldfrc(k+1) <= fmin) then
2856  faccld1u(k+1) = rat1
2857  faccld2u(k+1) = (fmin - cldfrc(k+1)) / fmin
2858  else
2859  faccld1u(k+1) = (cldfrc(k) - cldfrc(k+1)) &
2860  & / (cldfrc(k) - fmin)
2861  endif
2862  endif
2863 
2864  if (faccld1u(k+1)>f_zero .or. faccld2u(k+1)>f_zero) then
2865  rat1 = f_zero
2866  rat2 = f_one
2867  else
2868  rat1 = f_zero
2869  rat2 = f_zero
2870  endif
2871  endif
2872 
2873  faccmb1u(k+1) = facclr1u(k+1) * faccld2u(k) * cldfrc(k-1)
2874  faccmb2u(k+1) = faccld1u(k+1) * facclr2u(k) &
2875  & * (f_one - cldfrc(k-1))
2876  endif
2877 
2878  enddo
2879 
2880  do k = 0, nlay
2881  faccld1d(k) = f_zero
2882  faccld2d(k) = f_zero
2883  facclr1d(k) = f_zero
2884  facclr2d(k) = f_zero
2885  faccmb1d(k) = f_zero
2886  faccmb2d(k) = f_zero
2887  enddo
2888 
2889  lstcldd(nlay) = cldfrc(nlay) > eps
2890  rat1 = f_zero
2891  rat2 = f_zero
2892 
2893  do k = nlay, 2, -1
2894 
2895  lstcldd(k-1) = cldfrc(k-1) > eps .and. cldfrc(k)<=eps
2896 
2897  if (cldfrc(k) > eps) then
2898 
2899  if (cldfrc(k-1) >= cldfrc(k)) then
2900  if (lstcldd(k)) then
2901  if (cldfrc(k) < f_one) then
2902  facclr2d(k-1) = (cldfrc(k-1) - cldfrc(k)) &
2903  & / (f_one - cldfrc(k))
2904  endif
2905 
2906  facclr2d(k) = f_zero
2907  faccld2d(k) = f_zero
2908  else
2909  fmax = max(cldfrc(k), cldfrc(k+1))
2910 
2911  if (cldfrc(k-1) > fmax) then
2912  facclr1d(k-1) = rat2
2913  facclr2d(k-1) = (cldfrc(k-1) - fmax) / (f_one - fmax)
2914  elseif (cldfrc(k-1) < fmax) then
2915  facclr1d(k-1) = (cldfrc(k-1) - cldfrc(k)) &
2916  & / (cldfrc(k+1) - cldfrc(k))
2917  else
2918  facclr1d(k-1) = rat2
2919  endif
2920  endif
2921 
2922  if (facclr1d(k-1)>f_zero .or. facclr2d(k-1)>f_zero) then
2923  rat1 = f_one
2924  rat2 = f_zero
2925  else
2926  rat1 = f_zero
2927  rat2 = f_zero
2928  endif
2929  else
2930  if (lstcldd(k)) then
2931  faccld2d(k-1) = (cldfrc(k) - cldfrc(k-1)) / cldfrc(k)
2932  facclr2d(k) = f_zero
2933  faccld2d(k) = f_zero
2934  else
2935  fmin = min(cldfrc(k), cldfrc(k+1))
2936 
2937  if (cldfrc(k-1) <= fmin) then
2938  faccld1d(k-1) = rat1
2939  faccld2d(k-1) = (fmin - cldfrc(k-1)) / fmin
2940  else
2941  faccld1d(k-1) = (cldfrc(k) - cldfrc(k-1)) &
2942  & / (cldfrc(k) - fmin)
2943  endif
2944  endif
2945 
2946  if (faccld1d(k-1)>f_zero .or. faccld2d(k-1)>f_zero) then
2947  rat1 = f_zero
2948  rat2 = f_one
2949  else
2950  rat1 = f_zero
2951  rat2 = f_zero
2952  endif
2953  endif
2954 
2955  faccmb1d(k-1) = facclr1d(k-1) * faccld2d(k) * cldfrc(k+1)
2956  faccmb2d(k-1) = faccld1d(k-1) * facclr2d(k) &
2957  & * (f_one - cldfrc(k+1))
2958  endif
2959 
2960  enddo
2962 ! --- ... initialize for radiative transfer.
2963 
2964  do ib = 1, nbands
2965  do k = 0, nlay
2966  toturad(k,ib) = f_zero
2967  totdrad(k,ib) = f_zero
2968  clrurad(k,ib) = f_zero
2969  clrdrad(k,ib) = f_zero
2970  enddo
2971  enddo
2972 
2973  do k = 0, nlay
2974  totuflux(k) = f_zero
2975  totdflux(k) = f_zero
2976  totuclfl(k) = f_zero
2977  totdclfl(k) = f_zero
2978  enddo
2979 
2980 ! --- ... loop over all g-points
2981 
2982  do ig = 1, ngptlw
2983  ib = ngb(ig)
2984 
2985  radtotd = f_zero
2986  radclrd = f_zero
2988 ! --- ... downward radiative transfer loop.
2989 
2990  do k = nlay, 1, -1
2991 
2992 ! --- ... clear sky, gases contribution
2993 
2994  odepth = max( f_zero, secdif(ib)*tautot(ig,k) )
2995  if (odepth <= 0.06) then
2996  atrgas = odepth - 0.5*odepth*odepth
2997  trng = f_one - atrgas
2998  gasfac = rec_6 * odepth
2999  else
3000  tblind = odepth / (bpade + odepth)
3001  itgas = tblint*tblind + 0.5
3002  trng = exp_tbl(itgas)
3003  atrgas = f_one - trng
3004  gasfac = tfn_tbl(itgas)
3005  odepth = tau_tbl(itgas)
3006  endif
3007 
3008  plfrac = fracs(ig,k)
3009  blay = pklay(ib,k)
3010 
3011  dplnku = pklev(ib,k ) - blay
3012  dplnkd = pklev(ib,k-1) - blay
3013  bbdgas = plfrac * (blay + dplnkd*gasfac)
3014  bbugas = plfrac * (blay + dplnku*gasfac)
3015  gassrcd = bbdgas * atrgas
3016  gassrcu(k)= bbugas * atrgas
3017  trngas(k) = trng
3018 
3019 ! --- ... total sky, gases+clouds contribution
3020 
3021  clfr = cldfrc(k)
3022  if (lstcldd(k)) then
3023  totradd = clfr * radtotd
3024  clrradd = radtotd - totradd
3025  rad = f_zero
3026  endif
3027 
3028  if (clfr >= eps) then
3030 ! --- ... cloudy layer
3031 
3032  odcld = secdif(ib) * taucld(ib,k)
3033  odtot = odepth + odcld
3034  if (odtot < 0.06) then
3035  totfac = rec_6 * odtot
3036  atrtot = odtot - 0.5*odtot*odtot
3037  trnt = f_one - atrtot
3038  else
3039  tblind = odtot / (bpade + odtot)
3040  ittot = tblint*tblind + 0.5
3041  totfac = tfn_tbl(ittot)
3042  trnt = exp_tbl(ittot)
3043  atrtot = f_one - trnt
3044  endif
3045 
3046  bbdtot = plfrac * (blay + dplnkd*totfac)
3047  bbutot = plfrac * (blay + dplnku*totfac)
3048  totsrcd = bbdtot * atrtot
3049  totsrcu(k)= bbutot * atrtot
3050  trntot(k) = trnt
3051 
3052  totradd = totradd*trnt + clfr*totsrcd
3053  clrradd = clrradd*trng + (f_one - clfr)*gassrcd
3055 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3056  radtotd = totradd + clrradd
3057  totdrad(k-1,ib) = totdrad(k-1,ib) + radtotd
3059 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3060  radclrd = radclrd*trng + gassrcd
3061  clrdrad(k-1,ib) = clrdrad(k-1,ib) + radclrd
3062 
3063  radmod = rad*(facclr1d(k-1)*trng + faccld1d(k-1)*trnt) &
3064  & - faccmb1d(k-1)*gassrcd + faccmb2d(k-1)*totsrcd
3065 
3066  rad = -radmod + facclr2d(k-1)*(clrradd + radmod) &
3067  & - faccld2d(k-1)*(totradd - radmod)
3068  totradd = totradd + rad
3069  clrradd = clrradd - rad
3070 
3071  else
3072 ! --- ... clear layer
3073 
3074 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3075  radtotd = radtotd*trng + gassrcd
3076  totdrad(k-1,ib) = totdrad(k-1,ib) + radtotd
3077 
3078 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3079  radclrd = radclrd*trng + gassrcd
3080  clrdrad(k-1,ib) = clrdrad(k-1,ib) + radclrd
3081 
3082  endif ! end if_clfr_block
3083 
3084  enddo ! end do_k_loop
3087 ! --- ... spectral emissivity & reflectance
3088 ! include the contribution of spectrally varying longwave emissivity
3089 ! and reflection from the surface to the upward radiative transfer.
3090 ! note: spectral and Lambertian reflection are identical for the
3091 ! diffusivity angle flux integration used here.
3092 
3093  reflct = f_one - semiss(ib)
3094  rad0 = semiss(ib) * fracs(ig,1) * pklay(ib,0)
3096 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3097  radtotu = rad0 + reflct*radtotd
3098  toturad(0,ib) = toturad(0,ib) + radtotu
3100 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3101  radclru = rad0 + reflct*radclrd
3102  clrurad(0,ib) = clrurad(0,ib) + radclru
3104 ! --- ... upward radiative transfer loop.
3105 
3106  do k = 1, nlay
3107 
3108  clfr = cldfrc(k)
3109  trng = trngas(k)
3110  gasu = gassrcu(k)
3111 
3112  if (lstcldu(k)) then
3113  totradu = clfr * radtotu
3114  clrradu = radtotu - totradu
3115  rad = f_zero
3116  endif
3117 
3118  if (clfr >= eps) then
3120 ! --- ... cloudy layer
3121 
3122  trnt = trntot(k)
3123  totu = totsrcu(k)
3124  totradu = totradu*trnt + clfr*totu
3125  clrradu = clrradu*trng + (f_one - clfr)*gasu
3127 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3128  radtotu = totradu + clrradu
3129  toturad(k,ib) = toturad(k,ib) + radtotu
3131 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3132  radclru = radclru*trng + gasu
3133  clrurad(k,ib) = clrurad(k,ib) + radclru
3134 
3135  radmod = rad*(facclr1u(k+1)*trng + faccld1u(k+1)*trnt) &
3136  & - faccmb1u(k+1)*gasu + faccmb2u(k+1)*totu
3137  rad = -radmod + facclr2u(k+1)*(clrradu + radmod) &
3138  & - faccld2u(k+1)*(totradu - radmod)
3139  totradu = totradu + rad
3140  clrradu = clrradu - rad
3141 
3142  else
3143 ! --- ... clear layer
3144 
3145 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3146  radtotu = radtotu*trng + gasu
3147  toturad(k,ib) = toturad(k,ib) + radtotu
3148 
3149 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3150  radclru = radclru*trng + gasu
3151  clrurad(k,ib) = clrurad(k,ib) + radclru
3152 
3153  endif ! end if_clfr_block
3154 
3155  enddo ! end do_k_loop
3156 
3157  enddo ! end do_ig_loop
3160 ! --- ... process longwave output from band for total and clear streams.
3161 ! calculate upward, downward, and net flux.
3162 
3163  flxfac = wtdiff * fluxfac
3164 
3165  do k = 0, nlay
3166  do ib = 1, nbands
3167  totuflux(k) = totuflux(k) + toturad(k,ib)
3168  totdflux(k) = totdflux(k) + totdrad(k,ib)
3169  totuclfl(k) = totuclfl(k) + clrurad(k,ib)
3170  totdclfl(k) = totdclfl(k) + clrdrad(k,ib)
3171  enddo
3172 
3173  totuflux(k) = totuflux(k) * flxfac
3174  totdflux(k) = totdflux(k) * flxfac
3175  totuclfl(k) = totuclfl(k) * flxfac
3176  totdclfl(k) = totdclfl(k) * flxfac
3177  enddo
3178 
3179 ! --- ... calculate net fluxes and heating rates
3180  fnet(0) = totuflux(0) - totdflux(0)
3181 
3182  do k = 1, nlay
3183  rfdelp(k) = heatfac / delp(k)
3184  fnet(k) = totuflux(k) - totdflux(k)
3185  htr(k) = (fnet(k-1) - fnet(k)) * rfdelp(k)
3186  enddo
3187 
3188 !! --- ... optional clear sky heating rates
3189  if ( lhlw0 ) then
3190  fnetc(0) = totuclfl(0) - totdclfl(0)
3191 
3192  do k = 1, nlay
3193  fnetc(k) = totuclfl(k) - totdclfl(k)
3194  htrcl(k) = (fnetc(k-1) - fnetc(k)) * rfdelp(k)
3195  enddo
3196  endif
3197 
3198 !! --- ... optional spectral band heating rates
3199  if ( lhlwb ) then
3200  do ib = 1, nbands
3201  fnet(0) = (toturad(0,ib) - totdrad(0,ib)) * flxfac
3202 
3203  do k = 1, nlay
3204  fnet(k) = (toturad(k,ib) - totdrad(k,ib)) * flxfac
3205  htrb(k,ib) = (fnet(k-1) - fnet(k)) * rfdelp(k)
3206  enddo
3207  enddo
3208  endif
3209 
3210 ! .................................
3211  end subroutine rtrnmr
3212 ! ---------------------------------
3214 
3238 ! ---------------------------------
3239  subroutine rtrnmc
3240  & ( semiss,delp,cldfmc,taucld,tautot,pklay,pklev, ! --- inputs:
3241  & fracs,secdif, nlay,nlp1,
3242  & totuflux,totdflux,htr, totuclfl,totdclfl,htrcl, htrb ! --- outputs:
3243  & )
3244 
3245 ! =================== program usage description =================== !
3246 ! !
3247 ! purpose: compute the upward/downward radiative fluxes, and heating !
3248 ! rates for both clear or cloudy atmosphere. clouds are treated with !
3249 ! the mcica stochastic approach. !
3250 ! !
3251 ! subprograms called: none !
3252 ! !
3253 ! ==================== defination of variables ==================== !
3254 ! !
3255 ! inputs: -size- !
3256 ! semiss - real, lw surface emissivity nbands!
3257 ! delp - real, layer pressure thickness (mb) nlay !
3258 ! cldfmc - real, layer cloud fraction (sub-column) ngptlw*nlay!
3259 ! taucld - real, layer cloud opt depth nbands*nlay!
3260 ! tautot - real, total optical depth (gas+aerosols) ngptlw*nlay!
3261 ! pklay - real, integrated planck func at lay temp nbands*0:nlay!
3262 ! pklev - real, integrated planck func at lev temp nbands*0:nlay!
3263 ! fracs - real, planck fractions ngptlw*nlay!
3264 ! secdif - real, secant of diffusivity angle nbands!
3265 ! nlay - integer, number of vertical layers 1 !
3266 ! nlp1 - integer, number of vertical levels (interfaces) 1 !
3267 ! !
3268 ! outputs: !
3269 ! totuflux- real, total sky upward flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
3270 ! totdflux- real, total sky downward flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
3271 ! htr - real, total sky heating rate (k/sec or k/day) nlay !
3272 ! totuclfl- real, clear sky upward flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
3273 ! totdclfl- real, clear sky downward flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
3274 ! htrcl - real, clear sky heating rate (k/sec or k/day) nlay !
3275 ! htrb - real, spectral band lw heating rate (k/day) nlay*nbands!
3276 ! !
3277 ! module veriables: !
3278 ! ngb - integer, band index for each g-value ngptlw!
3279 ! fluxfac - real, conversion factor for fluxes (pi*2.e4) 1 !
3280 ! heatfac - real, conversion factor for heating rates (g/cp*1e-2) 1 !
3281 ! tblint - real, conversion factor for look-up tbl (float(ntbl) 1 !
3282 ! bpade - real, pade approx constant (1/0.278) 1 !
3283 ! wtdiff - real, weight for radiance to flux conversion 1 !
3284 ! ntbl - integer, dimension of look-up tables 1 !
3285 ! tau_tbl - real, clr-sky opt dep lookup table 0:ntbl !
3286 ! exp_tbl - real, transmittance lookup table 0:ntbl !
3287 ! tfn_tbl - real, tau transition function 0:ntbl !
3288 ! !
3289 ! local variables: !
3290 ! itgas - integer, index for gases contribution look-up table 1 !
3291 ! ittot - integer, index for gases plus clouds look-up table 1 !
3292 ! reflct - real, surface reflectance 1 !
3293 ! atrgas - real, gaseous absorptivity 1 !
3294 ! atrtot - real, gaseous and cloud absorptivity 1 !
3295 ! odcld - real, cloud optical depth 1 !
3296 ! efclrfr- real, effective clear sky fraction (1-efcldfr) nlay!
3297 ! odepth - real, optical depth of gaseous only 1 !
3298 ! odtot - real, optical depth of gas and cloud 1 !
3299 ! gasfac - real, gas-only pade factor, used for planck function 1 !
3300 ! totfac - real, gas and cloud pade factor, used for planck fn 1 !
3301 ! bbdgas - real, gas-only planck function for downward rt 1 !
3302 ! bbugas - real, gas-only planck function for upward rt 1 !
3303 ! bbdtot - real, gas and cloud planck function for downward rt 1 !
3304 ! bbutot - real, gas and cloud planck function for upward rt 1 !
3305 ! gassrcu- real, upwd source radiance due to gas nlay!
3306 ! totsrcu- real, upwd source radiance due to gas+cld nlay!
3307 ! gassrcd- real, dnwd source radiance due to gas 1 !
3308 ! totsrcd- real, dnwd source radiance due to gas+cld 1 !
3309 ! radtotu- real, spectrally summed total sky upwd radiance 1 !
3310 ! radclru- real, spectrally summed clear sky upwd radiance 1 !
3311 ! radtotd- real, spectrally summed total sky dnwd radiance 1 !
3312 ! radclrd- real, spectrally summed clear sky dnwd radiance 1 !
3313 ! toturad- real, total sky upward radiance by layer 0:nlay*nbands!
3314 ! clrurad- real, clear sky upward radiance by layer 0:nlay*nbands!
3315 ! totdrad- real, total sky downward radiance by layer 0:nlay*nbands!
3316 ! clrdrad- real, clear sky downward radiance by layer 0:nlay*nbands!
3317 ! fnet - real, net longwave flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
3318 ! fnetc - real, clear sky net longwave flux (w/m2) 0:nlay !
3319 ! !
3320 ! !
3321 ! ******************************************************************* !
3322 ! original code description !
3323 ! !
3324 ! original version: e. j. mlawer, et al. rrtm_v3.0 !
3325 ! revision for gcms: michael j. iacono; october, 2002 !
3326 ! revision for f90: michael j. iacono; june, 2006 !
3327 ! !
3328 ! this program calculates the upward fluxes, downward fluxes, and !
3329 ! heating rates for an arbitrary clear or cloudy atmosphere. the input !
3330 ! to this program is the atmospheric profile, all Planck function !
3331 ! information, and the cloud fraction by layer. a variable diffusivity!
3332 ! angle (secdif) is used for the angle integration. bands 2-3 and 5-9 !
3333 ! use a value for secdif that varies from 1.50 to 1.80 as a function !
3334 ! of the column water vapor, and other bands use a value of 1.66. the !
3335 ! gaussian weight appropriate to this angle (wtdiff=0.5) is applied !
3336 ! here. note that use of the emissivity angle for the flux integration!
3337 ! can cause errors of 1 to 4 W/m2 within cloudy layers. !
3338 ! clouds are treated with the mcica stochastic approach and !
3339 ! maximum-random cloud overlap. !
3340 ! !
3341 ! ******************************************************************* !
3342 ! ====================== end of description block ================= !
3343 
3344 ! --- inputs:
3345  integer, intent(in) :: nlay, nlp1
3346 
3347  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nbands), intent(in) :: semiss,
3348  & secdif
3349  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay), intent(in) :: delp
3350 
3351  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nbands,nlay),intent(in):: taucld
3352  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(ngptlw,nlay),intent(in):: fracs,
3353  & tautot, cldfmc
3354 
3355  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nbands,0:nlay), intent(in) ::
3356  & pklev, pklay
3357 
3358 ! --- outputs:
3359  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay), intent(out) :: htr, htrcl
3360 
3361  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay,nbands),intent(out) :: htrb
3362 
3363  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay), intent(out) ::
3364  & totuflux, totdflux, totuclfl, totdclfl
3365 
3366 ! --- locals:
3367  real (kind=kind_phys), parameter :: rec_6 = 0.166667
3368 
3369  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay,nbands) :: clrurad, &
3370  & clrdrad, toturad, totdrad
3371 
3372  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay) :: gassrcu, totsrcu, &
3373  & trngas, efclrfr, rfdelp
3374  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(0:nlay) :: fnet, fnetc
3375 
3376  real (kind=kind_phys) :: totsrcd, gassrcd, tblind, odepth, odtot, &
3377  & odcld, atrtot, atrgas, reflct, totfac, gasfac, flxfac, &
3378  & plfrac, blay, bbdgas, bbdtot, bbugas, bbutot, dplnku, &
3379  & dplnkd, radtotu, radclru, radtotd, radclrd, rad0, &
3380  & clfm, trng, gasu
3381 
3382  integer :: ittot, itgas, ib, ig, k
3383 !
3384 !===> ... begin here
3385 !
3386  do ib = 1, nbands
3387  do k = 0, nlay
3388  toturad(k,ib) = f_zero
3389  totdrad(k,ib) = f_zero
3390  clrurad(k,ib) = f_zero
3391  clrdrad(k,ib) = f_zero
3392  enddo
3393  enddo
3394 
3395  do k = 0, nlay
3396  totuflux(k) = f_zero
3397  totdflux(k) = f_zero
3398  totuclfl(k) = f_zero
3399  totdclfl(k) = f_zero
3400  enddo
3401 
3402 ! --- ... loop over all g-points
3403 
3404  do ig = 1, ngptlw
3405  ib = ngb(ig)
3406 
3407  radtotd = f_zero
3408  radclrd = f_zero
3409 
3416 ! --- ... downward radiative transfer loop.
3417 
3418  do k = nlay, 1, -1
3419 
3420 ! --- ... clear sky, gases contribution
3421 
3422  odepth = max( f_zero, secdif(ib)*tautot(ig,k) )
3423  if (odepth <= 0.06) then
3424  atrgas = odepth - 0.5*odepth*odepth
3425  trng = f_one - atrgas
3426  gasfac = rec_6 * odepth
3427  else
3428  tblind = odepth / (bpade + odepth)
3429  itgas = tblint*tblind + 0.5
3430  trng = exp_tbl(itgas)
3431  atrgas = f_one - trng
3432  gasfac = tfn_tbl(itgas)
3433  odepth = tau_tbl(itgas)
3434  endif
3435 
3436  plfrac = fracs(ig,k)
3437  blay = pklay(ib,k)
3438 
3439  dplnku = pklev(ib,k ) - blay
3440  dplnkd = pklev(ib,k-1) - blay
3441  bbdgas = plfrac * (blay + dplnkd*gasfac)
3442  bbugas = plfrac * (blay + dplnku*gasfac)
3443  gassrcd= bbdgas * atrgas
3444  gassrcu(k)= bbugas * atrgas
3445  trngas(k) = trng
3446 
3447 ! --- ... total sky, gases+clouds contribution
3448 
3449  clfm = cldfmc(ig,k)
3450  if (clfm >= eps) then
3451 ! --- ... cloudy layer
3452 
3453  odcld = secdif(ib) * taucld(ib,k)
3454  efclrfr(k) = f_one - (f_one - exp(-odcld))*clfm
3455  odtot = odepth + odcld
3456  if (odtot < 0.06) then
3457  totfac = rec_6 * odtot
3458  atrtot = odtot - 0.5*odtot*odtot
3459  else
3460  tblind = odtot / (bpade + odtot)
3461  ittot = tblint*tblind + 0.5
3462  totfac = tfn_tbl(ittot)
3463  atrtot = f_one - exp_tbl(ittot)
3464  endif
3465 
3466  bbdtot = plfrac * (blay + dplnkd*totfac)
3467  bbutot = plfrac * (blay + dplnku*totfac)
3468  totsrcd= bbdtot * atrtot
3469  totsrcu(k)= bbutot * atrtot
3470 
3471 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3472  radtotd = radtotd*trng*efclrfr(k) + gassrcd &
3473  & + clfm*(totsrcd - gassrcd)
3474  totdrad(k-1,ib) = totdrad(k-1,ib) + radtotd
3475 
3476 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3477  radclrd = radclrd*trng + gassrcd
3478  clrdrad(k-1,ib) = clrdrad(k-1,ib) + radclrd
3479 
3480  else
3481 ! --- ... clear layer
3482 
3483 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3484  radtotd = radtotd*trng + gassrcd
3485  totdrad(k-1,ib) = totdrad(k-1,ib) + radtotd
3486 
3487 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3488  radclrd = radclrd*trng + gassrcd
3489  clrdrad(k-1,ib) = clrdrad(k-1,ib) + radclrd
3490 
3491  endif ! end if_clfm_block
3492 
3493  enddo ! end do_k_loop
3494 
3498 ! --- ... spectral emissivity & reflectance
3499 ! include the contribution of spectrally varying longwave emissivity
3500 ! and reflection from the surface to the upward radiative transfer.
3501 ! note: spectral and Lambertian reflection are identical for the
3502 ! diffusivity angle flux integration used here.
3503 
3504  reflct = f_one - semiss(ib)
3505  rad0 = semiss(ib) * fracs(ig,1) * pklay(ib,0)
3507 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3508  radtotu = rad0 + reflct*radtotd
3509  toturad(0,ib) = toturad(0,ib) + radtotu
3511 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3512  radclru = rad0 + reflct*radclrd
3513  clrurad(0,ib) = clrurad(0,ib) + radclru
3517 ! --- ... upward radiative transfer
3518 ! toturad holds summed radiance for total sky stream
3519 ! clrurad holds summed radiance for clear sky stream
3520 
3521  do k = 1, nlay
3522  clfm = cldfmc(ig,k)
3523  trng = trngas(k)
3524  gasu = gassrcu(k)
3525 
3526  if (clfm > eps) then
3527 ! --- ... cloudy layer
3528 
3529 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3530  radtotu = radtotu*trng*efclrfr(k) + gasu &
3531  & + clfm*(totsrcu(k) - gasu)
3532  toturad(k,ib) = toturad(k,ib) + radtotu
3533 
3534 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3535  radclru = radclru*trng + gasu
3536  clrurad(k,ib) = clrurad(k,ib) + radclru
3537 
3538  else
3539 ! --- ... clear layer
3540 
3541 ! --- ... total sky radiance
3542  radtotu = radtotu*trng + gasu
3543  toturad(k,ib) = toturad(k,ib) + radtotu
3544 
3545 ! --- ... clear sky radiance
3546  radclru = radclru*trng + gasu
3547  clrurad(k,ib) = clrurad(k,ib) + radclru
3548 
3549  endif ! end if_clfm_block
3550 
3551  enddo ! end do_k_loop
3552 
3553  enddo ! end do_ig_loop
3556 ! --- ... process longwave output from band for total and clear streams.
3557 ! calculate upward, downward, and net flux.
3558 
3559  flxfac = wtdiff * fluxfac
3560 
3561  do k = 0, nlay
3562  do ib = 1, nbands
3563  totuflux(k) = totuflux(k) + toturad(k,ib)
3564  totdflux(k) = totdflux(k) + totdrad(k,ib)
3565  totuclfl(k) = totuclfl(k) + clrurad(k,ib)
3566  totdclfl(k) = totdclfl(k) + clrdrad(k,ib)
3567  enddo
3568 
3569  totuflux(k) = totuflux(k) * flxfac
3570  totdflux(k) = totdflux(k) * flxfac
3571  totuclfl(k) = totuclfl(k) * flxfac
3572  totdclfl(k) = totdclfl(k) * flxfac
3573  enddo
3574 
3575 ! --- ... calculate net fluxes and heating rates
3576  fnet(0) = totuflux(0) - totdflux(0)
3577 
3578  do k = 1, nlay
3579  rfdelp(k) = heatfac / delp(k)
3580  fnet(k) = totuflux(k) - totdflux(k)
3581  htr(k) = (fnet(k-1) - fnet(k)) * rfdelp(k)
3582  enddo
3583 
3584 !! --- ... optional clear sky heating rates
3585  if ( lhlw0 ) then
3586  fnetc(0) = totuclfl(0) - totdclfl(0)
3587 
3588  do k = 1, nlay
3589  fnetc(k) = totuclfl(k) - totdclfl(k)
3590  htrcl(k) = (fnetc(k-1) - fnetc(k)) * rfdelp(k)
3591  enddo
3592  endif
3593 
3594 !! --- ... optional spectral band heating rates
3595  if ( lhlwb ) then
3596  do ib = 1, nbands
3597  fnet(0) = (toturad(0,ib) - totdrad(0,ib)) * flxfac
3598 
3599  do k = 1, nlay
3600  fnet(k) = (toturad(k,ib) - totdrad(k,ib)) * flxfac
3601  htrb(k,ib) = (fnet(k-1) - fnet(k)) * rfdelp(k)
3602  enddo
3603  enddo
3604  endif
3605 
3606 ! ..................................
3607  end subroutine rtrnmc
3608 ! ----------------------------------
3640 ! !
3641 ! ----------------------------------
3642  subroutine taumol
3643  & ( laytrop,pavel,coldry,colamt,colbrd,wx,tauaer, ! --- inputs
3644  & rfrate,fac00,fac01,fac10,fac11,jp,jt,jt1,
3645  & selffac,selffrac,indself,forfac,forfrac,indfor,
3646  & minorfrac,scaleminor,scaleminorn2,indminor,
3647  & nlay,
3648  & fracs, tautot ! --- outputs
3649  & )
3650 
3651 ! ************ original subprogram description *************** !
3652 ! !
3653 ! optical depths developed for the !
3654 ! !
3655 ! rapid radiative transfer model (rrtm) !
3656 ! !
3657 ! atmospheric and environmental research, inc. !
3658 ! 131 hartwell avenue !
3659 ! lexington, ma 02421 !
3660 ! !
3661 ! eli j. mlawer !
3662 ! jennifer delamere !
3663 ! steven j. taubman !
3664 ! shepard a. clough !
3665 ! !
3666 ! email: mlawer@aer.com !
3667 ! email: jdelamer@aer.com !
3668 ! !
3669 ! the authors wish to acknowledge the contributions of the !
3670 ! following people: karen cady-pereira, patrick d. brown, !
3671 ! michael j. iacono, ronald e. farren, luke chen, !
3672 ! robert bergstrom. !
3673 ! !
3674 ! revision for g-point reduction: michael j. iacono; aer, inc. !
3675 ! !
3676 ! taumol !
3677 ! !
3678 ! this file contains the subroutines taugbn (where n goes from !
3679 ! 1 to 16). taugbn calculates the optical depths and planck !
3680 ! fractions per g-value and layer for band n. !
3681 ! !
3682 ! ******************************************************************* !
3683 ! ================== program usage description ================== !
3684 ! !
3685 ! call taumol !
3686 ! inputs: !
3687 ! ( laytrop,pavel,coldry,colamt,colbrd,wx,tauaer, !
3688 ! rfrate,fac00,fac01,fac10,fac11,jp,jt,jt1, !
3689 ! selffac,selffrac,indself,forfac,forfrac,indfor, !
3690 ! minorfrac,scaleminor,scaleminorn2,indminor, !
3691 ! nlay, !
3692 ! outputs: !
3693 ! fracs, tautot ) !
3694 ! !
3695 ! subprograms called: taugb## (## = 01 -16) !
3696 ! !
3697 ! !
3698 ! ==================== defination of variables ==================== !
3699 ! !
3700 ! inputs: size !
3701 ! laytrop - integer, tropopause layer index (unitless) 1 !
3702 ! layer at which switch is made for key species !
3703 ! pavel - real, layer pressures (mb) nlay !
3704 ! coldry - real, column amount for dry air (mol/cm2) nlay !
3705 ! colamt - real, column amounts of h2o, co2, o3, n2o, ch4, !
3706 ! o2, co (mol/cm**2) nlay*maxgas!
3707 ! colbrd - real, column amount of broadening gases nlay !
3708 ! wx - real, cross-section amounts(mol/cm2) nlay*maxxsec!
3709 ! tauaer - real, aerosol optical depth nbands*nlay !
3710 ! rfrate - real, reference ratios of binary species parameter !
3711 ! (:,m,:)m=1-h2o/co2,2-h2o/o3,3-h2o/n2o,4-h2o/ch4,5-n2o/co2,6-o3/co2!
3712 ! (:,:,n)n=1,2: the rates of ref press at the 2 sides of the layer !
3713 ! nlay*nrates*2!
3714 ! facij - real, factors multiply the reference ks, i,j of 0/1 !
3715 ! for lower/higher of the 2 appropriate temperatures !
3716 ! and altitudes nlay !
3717 ! jp - real, index of lower reference pressure nlay !
3718 ! jt, jt1 - real, indices of lower reference temperatures nlay !
3719 ! for pressure levels jp and jp+1, respectively !
3720 ! selffac - real, scale factor for water vapor self-continuum !
3721 ! equals (water vapor density)/(atmospheric density !
3722 ! at 296k and 1013 mb) nlay !
3723 ! selffrac - real, factor for temperature interpolation of !
3724 ! reference water vapor self-continuum data nlay !
3725 ! indself - integer, index of lower reference temperature for !
3726 ! the self-continuum interpolation nlay !
3727 ! forfac - real, scale factor for w. v. foreign-continuum nlay !
3728 ! forfrac - real, factor for temperature interpolation of !
3729 ! reference w.v. foreign-continuum data nlay !
3730 ! indfor - integer, index of lower reference temperature for !
3731 ! the foreign-continuum interpolation nlay !
3732 ! minorfrac - real, factor for minor gases nlay !
3733 ! scaleminor,scaleminorn2 !
3734 ! - real, scale factors for minor gases nlay !
3735 ! indminor - integer, index of lower reference temperature for !
3736 ! minor gases nlay !
3737 ! nlay - integer, total number of layers 1 !
3738 ! !
3739 ! outputs: !
3740 ! fracs - real, planck fractions ngptlw,nlay!
3741 ! tautot - real, total optical depth (gas+aerosols) ngptlw,nlay!
3742 ! !
3743 ! internal variables: !
3744 ! ng## - integer, number of g-values in band ## (##=01-16) 1 !
3745 ! nspa - integer, for lower atmosphere, the number of ref !
3746 ! atmos, each has different relative amounts of the !
3747 ! key species for the band nbands!
3748 ! nspb - integer, same but for upper atmosphere nbands!
3749 ! absa - real, k-values for lower ref atmospheres (no w.v. !
3750 ! self-continuum) (cm**2/molecule) nspa(##)*5*13*ng##!
3751 ! absb - real, k-values for high ref atmospheres (all sources) !
3752 ! (cm**2/molecule) nspb(##)*5*13:59*ng##!
3753 ! ka_m'mgas'- real, k-values for low ref atmospheres minor species !
3754 ! (cm**2/molecule) mmn##*ng##!
3755 ! kb_m'mgas'- real, k-values for high ref atmospheres minor species !
3756 ! (cm**2/molecule) mmn##*ng##!
3757 ! selfref - real, k-values for w.v. self-continuum for ref atmos !
3758 ! used below laytrop (cm**2/mol) 10*ng##!
3759 ! forref - real, k-values for w.v. foreign-continuum for ref atmos
3760 ! used below/above laytrop (cm**2/mol) 4*ng##!
3761 ! !
3762 ! ****************************************************************** !
3763 
3764 ! --- inputs:
3765  integer, intent(in) :: nlay, laytrop
3766 
3767  integer, dimension(nlay), intent(in) :: jp, jt, jt1, indself,
3768  & indfor, indminor
3769 
3770  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay), intent(in) :: pavel,
3771  & coldry, colbrd, fac00, fac01, fac10, fac11, selffac,
3772  & selffrac, forfac, forfrac, minorfrac, scaleminor,
3773  & scaleminorn2
3774 
3775  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay,maxgas), intent(in):: colamt
3776  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay,maxxsec),intent(in):: wx
3777 
3778  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nbands,nlay), intent(in):: tauaer
3779 
3780  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(nlay,nrates,2), intent(in) ::
3781  & rfrate
3782 
3783 ! --- outputs:
3784  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(ngptlw,nlay), intent(out) ::
3785  & fracs, tautot
3786 
3787 ! --- locals
3788  real (kind=kind_phys), dimension(ngptlw,nlay) :: taug
3789 
3790  integer :: ib, ig, k
3791 !
3792 !===> ... begin here
3793 !
3794  call taugb01
3795  call taugb02
3796  call taugb03
3797  call taugb04
3798  call taugb05
3799  call taugb06
3800  call taugb07
3801  call taugb08
3802  call taugb09
3803  call taugb10
3804  call taugb11
3805  call taugb12
3806  call taugb13
3807  call taugb14
3808  call taugb15
3809  call taugb16
3810 
3811 ! --- combine gaseous and aerosol optical depths
3812 
3813  do ig = 1, ngptlw
3814  ib = ngb(ig)
3815 
3816  do k = 1, nlay
3817  tautot(ig,k) = taug(ig,k) + tauaer(ib,k)
3818  enddo
3819  enddo
3820 
3821 ! =================
3822  contains
3823 ! =================
3824 
3825 ! ----------------------------------
3826  subroutine taugb01
3827 ! ..................................
3828 
3829 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
3830 ! written by eli j. mlawer, atmospheric & environmental research. !
3831 ! revised by michael j. iacono, atmospheric & environmental research. !
3832 ! !
3833 ! band 1: 10-350 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - n2) !
3834 ! (high key - h2o; high minor - n2) !
3835 ! !
3836 ! compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure) and !
3837 ! temperature. below laytrop, the water vapor self-continuum and !
3838 ! foreign continuum is interpolated (in temperature) separately. !
3839 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
3840 
3841  use module_radlw_kgb01
3842 
3843 ! --- locals:
3844  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
3845  & indm, indmp, ig
3846 
3847  real (kind=kind_phys) :: pp, corradj, scalen2, tauself, taufor, &
3848  & taun2
3849 !
3850 !===> ... begin here
3851 !
3852 ! --- minor gas mapping levels:
3853 ! lower - n2, p = 142.5490 mbar, t = 215.70 k
3854 ! upper - n2, p = 142.5490 mbar, t = 215.70 k
3855 
3856 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
3857 
3858  do k = 1, laytrop
3859  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(1) + 1
3860  ind1 = ( jp(k) *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(1) + 1
3861  inds = indself(k)
3862  indf = indfor(k)
3863  indm = indminor(k)
3864 
3865  ind0p = ind0 + 1
3866  ind1p = ind1 + 1
3867  indsp = inds + 1
3868  indfp = indf + 1
3869  indmp = indm + 1
3870 
3871  pp = pavel(k)
3872  scalen2 = colbrd(k) * scaleminorn2(k)
3873  if (pp < 250.0) then
3874  corradj = f_one - 0.15 * (250.0-pp) / 154.4
3875  else
3876  corradj = f_one
3877  endif
3878 
3879  do ig = 1, ng01
3880  tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
3881  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
3882  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
3883  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
3884  taun2 = scalen2 * (ka_mn2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
3885  & * (ka_mn2(ig,indmp) - ka_mn2(ig,indm)))
3886 
3887  taug(ig,k) = corradj * (colamt(k,1) &
3888  & * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p) &
3889  & + fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p)) &
3890  & + tauself + taufor + taun2)
3891 
3892  fracs(ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)
3893  enddo
3894  enddo
3895 
3896 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
3897 
3898  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
3899  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(1) + 1
3900  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(1) + 1
3901  indf = indfor(k)
3902  indm = indminor(k)
3903 
3904  ind0p = ind0 + 1
3905  ind1p = ind1 + 1
3906  indfp = indf + 1
3907  indmp = indm + 1
3908 
3909  scalen2 = colbrd(k) * scaleminorn2(k)
3910  corradj = f_one - 0.15 * (pavel(k) / 95.6)
3911 
3912  do ig = 1, ng01
3913  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
3914  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
3915  taun2 = scalen2 * (kb_mn2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
3916  & * (kb_mn2(ig,indmp) - kb_mn2(ig,indm)))
3917 
3918  taug(ig,k) = corradj * (colamt(k,1) &
3919  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
3920  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p)) &
3921  & + taufor + taun2)
3922 
3923  fracs(ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
3924  enddo
3925  enddo
3926 
3927 ! ..................................
3928  end subroutine taugb01
3929 ! ----------------------------------
3930 
3931 ! ----------------------------------
3932  subroutine taugb02
3933 ! ..................................
3934 
3935 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
3936 ! band 2: 350-500 cm-1 (low key - h2o; high key - h2o) !
3937 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
3938 
3939  use module_radlw_kgb02
3940 
3941 ! --- locals:
3942  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
3943  & ig
3944 
3945  real (kind=kind_phys) :: corradj, tauself, taufor
3946 !
3947 !===> ... begin here
3948 !
3949 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
3950 
3951  do k = 1, laytrop
3952  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(2) + 1
3953  ind1 = ( jp(k) *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(2) + 1
3954  inds = indself(k)
3955  indf = indfor(k)
3956 
3957  ind0p = ind0 + 1
3958  ind1p = ind1 + 1
3959  indsp = inds + 1
3960  indfp = indf + 1
3961 
3962  corradj = f_one - 0.05 * (pavel(k) - 100.0) / 900.0
3963 
3964  do ig = 1, ng02
3965  tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
3966  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
3967  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
3968  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
3969 
3970  taug(ns02+ig,k) = corradj * (colamt(k,1) &
3971  & * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p) &
3972  & + fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p)) &
3973  & + tauself + taufor)
3974 
3975  fracs(ns02+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)
3976  enddo
3977  enddo
3978 
3979 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
3980 
3981  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
3982  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(2) + 1
3983  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(2) + 1
3984  indf = indfor(k)
3985 
3986  ind0p = ind0 + 1
3987  ind1p = ind1 + 1
3988  indfp = indf + 1
3989 
3990  do ig = 1, ng02
3991  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
3992  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
3993 
3994  taug(ns02+ig,k) = colamt(k,1) &
3995  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
3996  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p)) &
3997  & + taufor
3998 
3999  fracs(ns02+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
4000  enddo
4001  enddo
4002 
4003 ! ..................................
4004  end subroutine taugb02
4005 ! ----------------------------------
4006 
4007 ! ----------------------------------
4008  subroutine taugb03
4009 ! ..................................
4010 
4011 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4012 ! band 3: 500-630 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; low minor - n2o) !
4013 ! (high key - h2o,co2; high minor - n2o) !
4014 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4015 
4016  use module_radlw_kgb03
4017 
4018 ! --- locals:
4019  integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, indm, indmp, &
4020  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, jmn2o, jmn2op, &
4021  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jpl, jplp, &
4022  & ig, js, js1
4023 
4024  real (kind=kind_phys) :: absn2o, ratn2o, adjfac, adjcoln2o, &
4025  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
4026  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
4027  & speccomb_mn2o, specparm_mn2o, specmult_mn2o, fmn2o, &
4028  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
4029  & refrat_planck_a, refrat_planck_b, refrat_m_a, refrat_m_b, &
4030  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
4031  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
4032  & tau_major, tau_major1, tauself, taufor, n2om1, n2om2, &
4033  & p, p4, fk0, fk1, fk2
4034 !
4035 !===> ... begin here
4036 !
4037 ! --- ... minor gas mapping levels:
4038 ! lower - n2o, p = 706.272 mbar, t = 278.94 k
4039 ! upper - n2o, p = 95.58 mbar, t = 215.7 k
4040 
4041  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,9)/chi_mls(2,9) ! P = 212.725 mb
4042  refrat_planck_b = chi_mls(1,13)/chi_mls(2,13) ! P = 95.58 mb
4043  refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(2,3) ! P = 706.270 mb
4044  refrat_m_b = chi_mls(1,13)/chi_mls(2,13) ! P = 95.58 mb
4045 
4046 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
4047 
4048  do k = 1, laytrop
4049  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,1)*colamt(k,2)
4050  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
4051  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
4052  js = 1 + int(specmult)
4053  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
4054  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(3) + js
4055 
4056  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,2)*colamt(k,2)
4057  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
4058  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
4059  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
4060  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
4061  ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(3) + js1
4062 
4063  speccomb_mn2o = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,2)
4064  specparm_mn2o = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mn2o
4065  specmult_mn2o = 8.0 * min(specparm_mn2o, oneminus)
4066  jmn2o = 1 + int(specmult_mn2o)
4067  fmn2o = mod(specmult_mn2o, f_one)
4068 
4069  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,2)
4070  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
4071  specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
4072  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
4073  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
4074 
4075  inds = indself(k)
4076  indf = indfor(k)
4077  indm = indminor(k)
4078  indsp = inds + 1
4079  indfp = indf + 1
4080  indmp = indm + 1
4081  jmn2op= jmn2o+ 1
4082  jplp = jpl + 1
4083 
4084 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of n2O is too great to be considered
4085 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of n2O by an empirical factor
4086 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
4087 
4088  p = coldry(k) * chi_mls(4,jp(k)+1)
4089  ratn2o = colamt(k,4) / p
4090  if (ratn2o > 1.5) then
4091  adjfac = 0.5 + (ratn2o - 0.5)**0.65
4092  adjcoln2o = adjfac * p
4093  else
4094  adjcoln2o = colamt(k,4)
4095  endif
4096 
4097  if (specparm < 0.125) then
4098  p = fs - f_one
4099  p4 = p**4
4100  fk0 = p4
4101  fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4
4102  fk2 = p + p4
4103  id000 = ind0
4104  id010 = ind0 + 9
4105  id100 = ind0 + 1
4106  id110 = ind0 +10
4107  id200 = ind0 + 2
4108  id210 = ind0 +11
4109  else if (specparm > 0.875) then
4110  p = -fs
4111  p4 = p**4
4112  fk0 = p4
4113  fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4
4114  fk2 = p + p4
4115  id000 = ind0 + 1
4116  id010 = ind0 +10
4117  id100 = ind0
4118  id110 = ind0 + 9
4119  id200 = ind0 - 1
4120  id210 = ind0 + 8
4121  else
4122  fk0 = f_one - fs
4123  fk1 = fs
4124  fk2 = f_zero
4125  id000 = ind0
4126  id010 = ind0 + 9
4127  id100 = ind0 + 1
4128  id110 = ind0 +10
4129  id200 = ind0
4130  id210 = ind0
4131  endif
4132 
4133  fac000 = fk0*fac00(k)
4134  fac100 = fk1*fac00(k)
4135  fac200 = fk2*fac00(k)
4136  fac010 = fk0*fac10(k)
4137  fac110 = fk1*fac10(k)
4138  fac210 = fk2*fac10(k)
4139 
4140  if (specparm1 < 0.125) then
4141  p = fs1 - f_one
4142  p4 = p**4
4143  fk0 = p4
4144  fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4
4145  fk2 = p + p4
4146  id001 = ind1
4147  id011 = ind1 + 9
4148  id101 = ind1 + 1
4149  id111 = ind1 +10
4150  id201 = ind1 + 2
4151  id211 = ind1 +11
4152  elseif (specparm1 > 0.875) then
4153  p = -fs1
4154  p4 = p**4
4155  fk0 = p4
4156  fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4
4157  fk2 = p + p4
4158  id001 = ind1 + 1
4159  id011 = ind1 +10
4160  id101 = ind1
4161  id111 = ind1 + 9
4162  id201 = ind1 - 1
4163  id211 = ind1 + 8
4164  else
4165  fk0 = f_one - fs1
4166  fk1 = fs1
4167  fk2 = f_zero
4168  id001 = ind1
4169  id011 = ind1 + 9
4170  id101 = ind1 + 1
4171  id111 = ind1 +10
4172  id201 = ind1
4173  id211 = ind1
4174  endif
4175 
4176  fac001 = fk0*fac01(k)
4177  fac101 = fk1*fac01(k)
4178  fac201 = fk2*fac01(k)
4179  fac011 = fk0*fac11(k)
4180  fac111 = fk1*fac11(k)
4181  fac211 = fk2*fac11(k)
4182 
4183  do ig = 1, ng03
4184  tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
4185  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
4186  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
4187  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
4188  n2om1 = ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indm) + fmn2o &
4189  & * (ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2op,indm) - ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indm))
4190  n2om2 = ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indmp) + fmn2o &
4191  & * (ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2op,indmp) - ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indmp))
4192  absn2o = n2om1 + minorfrac(k) * (n2om2 - n2om1)
4193 
4194  tau_major = speccomb &
4195  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
4196  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
4197  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210))
4198 
4199  tau_major1 = speccomb1 &
4200  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
4201  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
4202  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211))
4203 
4204  taug(ns03+ig,k) = tau_major + tau_major1 &
4205  & + tauself + taufor + adjcoln2o*absn2o
4206 
4207  fracs(ns03+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
4208  & * (fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
4209  enddo ! end do_k_loop
4210  enddo ! end do_ig_loop
4211 
4212 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
4213 
4214  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
4215  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,1)*colamt(k,2)
4216  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
4217  specmult = 4.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
4218  js = 1 + int(specmult)
4219  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
4220  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(3) + js
4221 
4222  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,2)*colamt(k,2)
4223  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
4224  specmult1 = 4.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
4225  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
4226  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
4227  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(3) + js1
4228 
4229  speccomb_mn2o = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_b*colamt(k,2)
4230  specparm_mn2o = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mn2o
4231  specmult_mn2o = 4.0 * min(specparm_mn2o, oneminus)
4232  jmn2o = 1 + int(specmult_mn2o)
4233  fmn2o = mod(specmult_mn2o, f_one)
4234 
4235  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_b*colamt(k,2)
4236  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
4237  specmult_planck = 4.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
4238  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
4239  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
4240 
4241  indf = indfor(k)
4242  indm = indminor(k)
4243  indfp = indf + 1
4244  indmp = indm + 1
4245  jmn2op= jmn2o+ 1
4246  jplp = jpl + 1
4247 
4248  id000 = ind0
4249  id010 = ind0 + 5
4250  id100 = ind0 + 1
4251  id110 = ind0 + 6
4252  id001 = ind1
4253  id011 = ind1 + 5
4254  id101 = ind1 + 1
4255  id111 = ind1 + 6
4256 
4257 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of n2o is too great to be considered
4258 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of N2O by an empirical factor
4259 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
4260 
4261  p = coldry(k) * chi_mls(4,jp(k)+1)
4262  ratn2o = colamt(k,4) / p
4263  if (ratn2o > 1.5) then
4264  adjfac = 0.5 + (ratn2o - 0.5)**0.65
4265  adjcoln2o = adjfac * p
4266  else
4267  adjcoln2o = colamt(k,4)
4268  endif
4269 
4270  fk0 = f_one - fs
4271  fk1 = fs
4272  fac000 = fk0*fac00(k)
4273  fac010 = fk0*fac10(k)
4274  fac100 = fk1*fac00(k)
4275  fac110 = fk1*fac10(k)
4276 
4277  fk0 = f_one - fs1
4278  fk1 = fs1
4279  fac001 = fk0*fac01(k)
4280  fac011 = fk0*fac11(k)
4281  fac101 = fk1*fac01(k)
4282  fac111 = fk1*fac11(k)
4283 
4284  do ig = 1, ng03
4285  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
4286  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
4287  n2om1 = kb_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indm) + fmn2o &
4288  & * (kb_mn2o(ig,jmn2op,indm) - kb_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indm))
4289  n2om2 = kb_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indmp) + fmn2o &
4290  & * (kb_mn2o(ig,jmn2op,indmp) - kb_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indmp))
4291  absn2o = n2om1 + minorfrac(k) * (n2om2 - n2om1)
4292 
4293  tau_major = speccomb &
4294  & * (fac000*absb(ig,id000) + fac010*absb(ig,id010) &
4295  & + fac100*absb(ig,id100) + fac110*absb(ig,id110))
4296 
4297  tau_major1 = speccomb1 &
4298  & * (fac001*absb(ig,id001) + fac011*absb(ig,id011) &
4299  & + fac101*absb(ig,id101) + fac111*absb(ig,id111))
4300 
4301  taug(ns03+ig,k) = tau_major + tau_major1 &
4302  & + taufor + adjcoln2o*absn2o
4303 
4304  fracs(ns03+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig,jpl) + fpl &
4305  & * (fracrefb(ig,jplp) - fracrefb(ig,jpl))
4306  enddo
4307  enddo
4308 
4309 ! ..................................
4310  end subroutine taugb03
4311 ! ----------------------------------
4312 
4313 ! ----------------------------------
4314  subroutine taugb04
4315 ! ..................................
4316 
4317 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4318 ! band 4: 630-700 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; high key - o3,co2) !
4319 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4320 
4321  use module_radlw_kgb04
4322 
4323 ! --- locals:
4324  integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, jpl, jplp, &
4325  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, ig, js, js1, &
4326  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211
4327 
4328  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, p, p4, fk0, fk1, fk2, &
4329  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
4330  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
4331  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
4332  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
4333  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
4334  & refrat_planck_a, refrat_planck_b, tau_major, tau_major1
4335 !
4336 !===> ... begin here
4337 !
4338  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,11)/chi_mls(2,11) ! P = 142.5940 mb
4339  refrat_planck_b = chi_mls(3,13)/chi_mls(2,13) ! P = 95.58350 mb
4340 
4341 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
4342 
4343  do k = 1, laytrop
4344  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,1)*colamt(k,2)
4345  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
4346  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
4347  js = 1 + int(specmult)
4348  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
4349  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(4) + js
4350 
4351  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,2)*colamt(k,2)
4352  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
4353  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
4354  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
4355  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
4356  ind1 = ( jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(4) + js1
4357 
4358  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,2)
4359  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
4360  specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
4361  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
4362  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, 1.0)
4363 
4364  inds = indself(k)
4365  indf = indfor(k)
4366  indsp = inds + 1
4367  indfp = indf + 1
4368  jplp = jpl + 1
4369 
4370  if (specparm < 0.125) then
4371  p = fs - f_one
4372  p4 = p**4
4373  fk0 = p4
4374  fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4
4375  fk2 = p + p4
4376  id000 = ind0
4377  id010 = ind0 + 9
4378  id100 = ind0 + 1
4379  id110 = ind0 +10
4380  id200 = ind0 + 2
4381  id210 = ind0 +11
4382  elseif (specparm > 0.875) then
4383  p = -fs
4384  p4 = p**4
4385  fk0 = p4
4386  fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4
4387  fk2 = p + p4
4388  id000 = ind0 + 1
4389  id010 = ind0 +10
4390  id100 = ind0
4391  id110 = ind0 + 9
4392  id200 = ind0 - 1
4393  id210 = ind0 + 8
4394  else
4395  fk0 = f_one - fs
4396  fk1 = fs
4397  fk2 = f_zero
4398  id000 = ind0
4399  id010 = ind0 + 9
4400  id100 = ind0 + 1
4401  id110 = ind0 +10
4402  id200 = ind0
4403  id210 = ind0
4404  endif
4405 
4406  fac000 = fk0*fac00(k)
4407  fac100 = fk1*fac00(k)
4408  fac200 = fk2*fac00(k)
4409  fac010 = fk0*fac10(k)
4410  fac110 = fk1*fac10(k)
4411  fac210 = fk2*fac10(k)
4412 
4413  if (specparm1 < 0.125) then
4414  p = fs1 - f_one
4415  p4 = p**4
4416  fk0 = p4
4417  fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4
4418  fk2 = p + p4
4419  id001 = ind1
4420  id011 = ind1 + 9
4421  id101 = ind1 + 1
4422  id111 = ind1 +10
4423  id201 = ind1 + 2
4424  id211 = ind1 +11
4425  elseif (specparm1 > 0.875) then
4426  p = -fs1
4427  p4 = p**4
4428  fk0 = p4
4429  fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4
4430  fk2 = p + p4
4431  id001 = ind1 + 1
4432  id011 = ind1 +10
4433  id101 = ind1
4434  id111 = ind1 + 9
4435  id201 = ind1 - 1
4436  id211 = ind1 + 8
4437  else
4438  fk0 = f_one - fs1
4439  fk1 = fs1
4440  fk2 = f_zero
4441  id001 = ind1
4442  id011 = ind1 + 9
4443  id101 = ind1 + 1
4444  id111 = ind1 +10
4445  id201 = ind1
4446  id211 = ind1
4447  endif
4448 
4449  fac001 = fk0*fac01(k)
4450  fac101 = fk1*fac01(k)
4451  fac201 = fk2*fac01(k)
4452  fac011 = fk0*fac11(k)
4453  fac111 = fk1*fac11(k)
4454  fac211 = fk2*fac11(k)
4455 
4456  do ig = 1, ng04
4457  tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
4458  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
4459  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
4460  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
4461 
4462  tau_major = speccomb &
4463  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
4464  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
4465  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210))
4466 
4467  tau_major1 = speccomb1 &
4468  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
4469  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
4470  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211))
4471 
4472  taug(ns04+ig,k) = tau_major + tau_major1 + tauself + taufor
4473 
4474  fracs(ns04+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
4475  & * (fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
4476  enddo ! end do_k_loop
4477  enddo ! end do_ig_loop
4478 
4479 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
4480 
4481  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
4482  speccomb = colamt(k,3) + rfrate(k,6,1)*colamt(k,2)
4483  specparm = colamt(k,3) / speccomb
4484  specmult = 4.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
4485  js = 1 + int(specmult)
4486  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
4487  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(4) + js
4488 
4489  speccomb1 = colamt(k,3) + rfrate(k,6,2)*colamt(k,2)
4490  specparm1 = colamt(k,3) / speccomb1
4491  specmult1 = 4.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
4492  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
4493  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
4494  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(4) + js1
4495 
4496  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,3) + refrat_planck_b*colamt(k,2)
4497  specparm_planck = colamt(k,3) / speccomb_planck
4498  specmult_planck = 4.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
4499  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
4500  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
4501  jplp = jpl + 1
4502 
4503  id000 = ind0
4504  id010 = ind0 + 5
4505  id100 = ind0 + 1
4506  id110 = ind0 + 6
4507  id001 = ind1
4508  id011 = ind1 + 5
4509  id101 = ind1 + 1
4510  id111 = ind1 + 6
4511 
4512  fk0 = f_one - fs
4513  fk1 = fs
4514  fac000 = fk0*fac00(k)
4515  fac010 = fk0*fac10(k)
4516  fac100 = fk1*fac00(k)
4517  fac110 = fk1*fac10(k)
4518 
4519  fk0 = f_one - fs1
4520  fk1 = fs1
4521  fac001 = fk0*fac01(k)
4522  fac011 = fk0*fac11(k)
4523  fac101 = fk1*fac01(k)
4524  fac111 = fk1*fac11(k)
4525 
4526  do ig = 1, ng04
4527  tau_major = speccomb &
4528  & * (fac000*absb(ig,id000) + fac010*absb(ig,id010) &
4529  & + fac100*absb(ig,id100) + fac110*absb(ig,id110))
4530  tau_major1 = speccomb1 &
4531  & * (fac001*absb(ig,id001) + fac011*absb(ig,id011) &
4532  & + fac101*absb(ig,id101) + fac111*absb(ig,id111))
4533 
4534  taug(ns04+ig,k) = tau_major + tau_major1
4535 
4536  fracs(ns04+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig,jpl) + fpl &
4537  & * (fracrefb(ig,jplp) - fracrefb(ig,jpl))
4538  enddo
4539 
4540 ! --- ... empirical modification to code to improve stratospheric cooling rates
4541 ! for co2. revised to apply weighting for g-point reduction in this band.
4542 
4543  taug(ns04+ 8,k) = taug(ns04+ 8,k) * 0.92
4544  taug(ns04+ 9,k) = taug(ns04+ 9,k) * 0.88
4545  taug(ns04+10,k) = taug(ns04+10,k) * 1.07
4546  taug(ns04+11,k) = taug(ns04+11,k) * 1.1
4547  taug(ns04+12,k) = taug(ns04+12,k) * 0.99
4548  taug(ns04+13,k) = taug(ns04+13,k) * 0.88
4549  taug(ns04+14,k) = taug(ns04+14,k) * 0.943
4550  enddo
4551 
4552 ! ..................................
4553  end subroutine taugb04
4554 ! ----------------------------------
4555 
4556 ! ----------------------------------
4557  subroutine taugb05
4558 ! ..................................
4559 
4560 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4561 ! band 5: 700-820 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; low minor - o3, ccl4) !
4562 ! (high key - o3,co2) !
4563 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4564 
4565  use module_radlw_kgb05
4566 
4567 ! --- locals:
4568  integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, indm, indmp, &
4569  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, jmo3, jmo3p, &
4570  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jpl, jplp, &
4571  & ig, js, js1
4572 
4573  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, o3m1, o3m2, abso3, &
4574  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
4575  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
4576  & speccomb_mo3, specparm_mo3, specmult_mo3, fmo3, &
4577  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
4578  & refrat_planck_a, refrat_planck_b, refrat_m_a, &
4579  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
4580  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
4581  & p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21
4582 !
4583 !===> ... begin here
4584 !
4585 ! --- ... minor gas mapping level :
4586 ! lower - o3, p = 317.34 mbar, t = 240.77 k
4587 ! lower - ccl4
4588 
4589 ! --- ... calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck
4590 ! fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.
4591 
4592  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,5)/chi_mls(2,5) ! P = 473.420 mb
4593  refrat_planck_b = chi_mls(3,43)/chi_mls(2,43) ! P = 0.2369 mb
4594  refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,7)/chi_mls(2,7) ! P = 317.348 mb
4595 
4596 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
4597 
4598  do k = 1, laytrop
4599  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,1)*colamt(k,2)
4600  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
4601  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
4602  js = 1 + int(specmult)
4603  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
4604  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(5) + js
4605 
4606  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,2)*colamt(k,2)
4607  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
4608  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
4609  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
4610  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
4611  ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(5) + js1
4612 
4613  speccomb_mo3 = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,2)
4614  specparm_mo3 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mo3
4615  specmult_mo3 = 8.0 * min(specparm_mo3, oneminus)
4616  jmo3 = 1 + int(specmult_mo3)
4617  fmo3 = mod(specmult_mo3, f_one)
4618 
4619  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,2)
4620  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
4621  specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
4622  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
4623  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
4624 
4625  inds = indself(k)
4626  indf = indfor(k)
4627  indm = indminor(k)
4628  indsp = inds + 1
4629  indfp = indf + 1
4630  indmp = indm + 1
4631  jplp = jpl + 1
4632  jmo3p = jmo3 + 1
4633 
4634  if (specparm < 0.125 .and. specparm1 < 0.125) then
4635  p0 = fs - f_one
4636  p40 = p0**4
4637  fk00 = p40
4638  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
4639  fk20 = p0 + p40
4640 
4641  p1 = fs1 - f_one
4642  p41 = p1**4
4643  fk01 = p41
4644  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
4645  fk21 = p1 + p41
4646 
4647  id000 = ind0
4648  id010 = ind0 + 9
4649  id100 = ind0 + 1
4650  id110 = ind0 +10
4651  id200 = ind0 + 2
4652  id210 = ind0 +11
4653 
4654  id001 = ind1
4655  id011 = ind1 + 9
4656  id101 = ind1 + 1
4657  id111 = ind1 +10
4658  id201 = ind1 + 2
4659  id211 = ind1 +11
4660  elseif (specparm > 0.875 .and. specparm1 > 0.875) then
4661  p0 = -fs
4662  p40 = p0**4
4663  fk00 = p40
4664  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
4665  fk20 = p0 + p40
4666 
4667  p1 = -fs1
4668  p41 = p1**4
4669  fk01 = p41
4670  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
4671  fk21 = p1 + p41
4672 
4673  id000 = ind0 + 1
4674  id010 = ind0 +10
4675  id100 = ind0
4676  id110 = ind0 + 9
4677  id200 = ind0 - 1
4678  id210 = ind0 + 8
4679 
4680  id001 = ind1 + 1
4681  id011 = ind1 +10
4682  id101 = ind1
4683  id111 = ind1 + 9
4684  id201 = ind1 - 1
4685  id211 = ind1 + 8
4686  else
4687  fk00 = f_one - fs
4688  fk10 = fs
4689  fk20 = f_zero
4690 
4691  fk01 = f_one - fs1
4692  fk11 = fs1
4693  fk21 = f_zero
4694 
4695  id000 = ind0
4696  id010 = ind0 + 9
4697  id100 = ind0 + 1
4698  id110 = ind0 +10
4699  id200 = ind0
4700  id210 = ind0
4701 
4702  id001 = ind1
4703  id011 = ind1 + 9
4704  id101 = ind1 + 1
4705  id111 = ind1 +10
4706  id201 = ind1
4707  id211 = ind1
4708  endif
4709 
4710  fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)
4711  fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)
4712  fac200 = fk20 * fac00(k)
4713  fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)
4714  fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)
4715  fac210 = fk20 * fac10(k)
4716 
4717  fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)
4718  fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)
4719  fac201 = fk21 * fac01(k)
4720  fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)
4721  fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)
4722  fac211 = fk21 * fac11(k)
4723 
4724  do ig = 1, ng05
4725  tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
4726  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
4727  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
4728  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
4729  o3m1 = ka_mo3(ig,jmo3,indm) + fmo3 &
4730  & * (ka_mo3(ig,jmo3p,indm) - ka_mo3(ig,jmo3,indm))
4731  o3m2 = ka_mo3(ig,jmo3,indmp) + fmo3 &
4732  & * (ka_mo3(ig,jmo3p,indmp) - ka_mo3(ig,jmo3,indmp))
4733  abso3 = o3m1 + minorfrac(k)*(o3m2 - o3m1)
4734 
4735  taug(ns05+ig,k) = speccomb &
4736  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
4737  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
4738  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210)) &
4739  & + speccomb1 &
4740  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
4741  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
4742  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211)) &
4743  & + tauself + taufor+abso3*colamt(k,3)+wx(k,1)*ccl4(ig)
4744 
4745  fracs(ns05+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
4746  & * (fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
4747  enddo
4748  enddo
4749 
4750 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
4751 
4752  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
4753  speccomb = colamt(k,3) + rfrate(k,6,1)*colamt(k,2)
4754  specparm = colamt(k,3) / speccomb
4755  specmult = 4.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
4756  js = 1 + int(specmult)
4757  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
4758  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(5) + js
4759 
4760  speccomb1 = colamt(k,3) + rfrate(k,6,2)*colamt(k,2)
4761  specparm1 = colamt(k,3) / speccomb1
4762  specmult1 = 4.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
4763  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
4764  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
4765  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(5) + js1
4766 
4767  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,3) + refrat_planck_b*colamt(k,2)
4768  specparm_planck = colamt(k,3) / speccomb_planck
4769  specmult_planck = 4.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
4770  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
4771  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
4772  jplp= jpl + 1
4773 
4774  id000 = ind0
4775  id010 = ind0 + 5
4776  id100 = ind0 + 1
4777  id110 = ind0 + 6
4778  id001 = ind1
4779  id011 = ind1 + 5
4780  id101 = ind1 + 1
4781  id111 = ind1 + 6
4782 
4783  fk00 = f_one - fs
4784  fk10 = fs
4785 
4786  fk01 = f_one - fs1
4787  fk11 = fs1
4788 
4789  fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)
4790  fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)
4791  fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)
4792  fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)
4793 
4794  fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)
4795  fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)
4796  fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)
4797  fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)
4798 
4799  do ig = 1, ng05
4800  taug(ns05+ig,k) = speccomb &
4801  & * (fac000*absb(ig,id000) + fac010*absb(ig,id010) &
4802  & + fac100*absb(ig,id100) + fac110*absb(ig,id110)) &
4803  & + speccomb1 &
4804  & * (fac001*absb(ig,id001) + fac011*absb(ig,id011) &
4805  & + fac101*absb(ig,id101) + fac111*absb(ig,id111)) &
4806  & + wx(k,1) * ccl4(ig)
4807 
4808  fracs(ns05+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig,jpl) + fpl &
4809  & * (fracrefb(ig,jplp) - fracrefb(ig,jpl))
4810  enddo
4811  enddo
4812 
4813 ! ..................................
4814  end subroutine taugb05
4815 ! ----------------------------------
4816 
4817 ! ----------------------------------
4818  subroutine taugb06
4819 ! ..................................
4820 
4821 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4822 ! band 6: 820-980 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - co2) !
4823 ! (high key - none; high minor - cfc11, cfc12)
4824 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4825 
4826  use module_radlw_kgb06
4827 
4828 ! --- locals:
4829  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
4830  & indm, indmp, ig
4831 
4832  real (kind=kind_phys) :: ratco2, adjfac, adjcolco2, tauself, &
4833  & taufor, absco2, temp
4834 !
4835 !===> ... begin here
4836 !
4837 ! --- ... minor gas mapping level:
4838 ! lower - co2, p = 706.2720 mb, t = 294.2 k
4839 ! upper - cfc11, cfc12
4840 
4841 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
4842 
4843  do k = 1, laytrop
4844  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(6) + 1
4845  ind1 = ( jp(k) *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(6) + 1
4846 
4847  inds = indself(k)
4848  indf = indfor(k)
4849  indm = indminor(k)
4850  indsp = inds + 1
4851  indfp = indf + 1
4852  indmp = indm + 1
4853  ind0p = ind0 + 1
4854  ind1p = ind1 + 1
4855 
4856 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered
4857 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor
4858 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
4859 
4860  temp = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)
4861  ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp
4862  if (ratco2 > 3.0) then
4863  adjfac = 2.0 + (ratco2-2.0)**0.77
4864  adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp
4865  else
4866  adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)
4867  endif
4868 
4869  do ig = 1, ng06
4870  tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
4871  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
4872  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
4873  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
4874  absco2 = ka_mco2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
4875  & * (ka_mco2(ig,indmp) - ka_mco2(ig,indm))
4876 
4877  taug(ns06+ig,k) = colamt(k,1) &
4878  & * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p) &
4879  & + fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p)) &
4880  & + tauself + taufor + adjcolco2*absco2 &
4881  & + wx(k,2)*cfc11adj(ig) + wx(k,3)*cfc12(ig)
4882 
4883  fracs(ns06+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)
4884  enddo
4885  enddo
4886 
4887 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
4888 ! nothing important goes on above laytrop in this band.
4889 
4890  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
4891  do ig = 1, ng06
4892  taug(ns06+ig,k) = wx(k,2)*cfc11adj(ig) + wx(k,3)*cfc12(ig)
4893 
4894  fracs(ns06+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)
4895  enddo
4896  enddo
4897 
4898 ! ..................................
4899  end subroutine taugb06
4900 ! ----------------------------------
4901 
4902 ! ----------------------------------
4903  subroutine taugb07
4904 ! ..................................
4905 
4906 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4907 ! band 7: 980-1080 cm-1 (low key - h2o,o3; low minor - co2) !
4908 ! (high key - o3; high minor - co2) !
4909 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
4910 
4911  use module_radlw_kgb07
4912 
4913 ! --- locals:
4914  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
4915  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, indm, indmp, &
4916  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jmco2, jmco2p, &
