4917  & jpl, jplp, ig, js, js1
4918 
4919  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, co2m1, co2m2, absco2, &
4920  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
4921  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
4922  & speccomb_mco2, specparm_mco2, specmult_mco2, fmco2, &
4923  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
4924  & refrat_planck_a, refrat_m_a, ratco2, adjfac, adjcolco2, &
4925  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
4926  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
4927  & p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21, temp
4928 !
4929 !===> ... begin here
4930 !
4931 ! --- ... minor gas mapping level :
4932 ! lower - co2, p = 706.2620 mbar, t= 278.94 k
4933 ! upper - co2, p = 12.9350 mbar, t = 234.01 k
4934 
4935 ! --- ... calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck
4936 ! fraction in lower atmosphere.
4937 
4938  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(3,3) ! P = 706.2620 mb
4939  refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(3,3) ! P = 706.2720 mb
4940 
4941 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
4942 
4943  do k = 1, laytrop
4944  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,2,1)*colamt(k,3)
4945  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
4946  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
4947  js = 1 + int(specmult)
4948  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
4949  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(7) + js
4950 
4951  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,2,2)*colamt(k,3)
4952  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
4953  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
4954  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
4955  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
4956  ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(7) + js1
4957 
4958  speccomb_mco2 = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,3)
4959  specparm_mco2 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mco2
4960  specmult_mco2 = 8.0 * min(specparm_mco2, oneminus)
4961  jmco2 = 1 + int(specmult_mco2)
4962  fmco2 = mod(specmult_mco2, f_one)
4963 
4964  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,3)
4965  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
4966  specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
4967  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
4968  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
4969 
4970  inds = indself(k)
4971  indf = indfor(k)
4972  indm = indminor(k)
4973  indsp = inds + 1
4974  indfp = indf + 1
4975  indmp = indm + 1
4976  jplp = jpl + 1
4977  jmco2p= jmco2+ 1
4978  ind0p = ind0 + 1
4979  ind1p = ind1 + 1
4980 
4981 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of CO2 is too great to be considered
4982 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of CO2 by an empirical factor
4983 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
4984 
4985  temp = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)
4986  ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp
4987  if (ratco2 > 3.0) then
4988  adjfac = 3.0 + (ratco2-3.0)**0.79
4989  adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp
4990  else
4991  adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)
4992  endif
4993 
4994  if (specparm < 0.125 .and. specparm1 < 0.125) then
4995  p0 = fs - f_one
4996  p40 = p0**4
4997  fk00 = p40
4998  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
4999  fk20 = p0 + p40
5000 
5001  p1 = fs1 - f_one
5002  p41 = p1**4
5003  fk01 = p41
5004  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
5005  fk21 = p1 + p41
5006 
5007  id000 = ind0
5008  id010 = ind0 + 9
5009  id100 = ind0 + 1
5010  id110 = ind0 +10
5011  id200 = ind0 + 2
5012  id210 = ind0 +11
5013 
5014  id001 = ind1
5015  id011 = ind1 + 9
5016  id101 = ind1 + 1
5017  id111 = ind1 +10
5018  id201 = ind1 + 2
5019  id211 = ind1 +11
5020  elseif (specparm > 0.875 .and. specparm1 > 0.875) then
5021  p0 = -fs
5022  p40 = p0**4
5023  fk00 = p40
5024  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
5025  fk20 = p0 + p40
5026 
5027  p1 = -fs1
5028  p41 = p1**4
5029  fk01 = p41
5030  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
5031  fk21 = p1 + p41
5032 
5033  id000 = ind0 + 1
5034  id010 = ind0 +10
5035  id100 = ind0
5036  id110 = ind0 + 9
5037  id200 = ind0 - 1
5038  id210 = ind0 + 8
5039 
5040  id001 = ind1 + 1
5041  id011 = ind1 +10
5042  id101 = ind1
5043  id111 = ind1 + 9
5044  id201 = ind1 - 1
5045  id211 = ind1 + 8
5046  else
5047  fk00 = f_one - fs
5048  fk10 = fs
5049  fk20 = f_zero
5050 
5051  fk01 = f_one - fs1
5052  fk11 = fs1
5053  fk21 = f_zero
5054 
5055  id000 = ind0
5056  id010 = ind0 + 9
5057  id100 = ind0 + 1
5058  id110 = ind0 +10
5059  id200 = ind0
5060  id210 = ind0
5061 
5062  id001 = ind1
5063  id011 = ind1 + 9
5064  id101 = ind1 + 1
5065  id111 = ind1 +10
5066  id201 = ind1
5067  id211 = ind1
5068  endif
5069 
5070  fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)
5071  fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)
5072  fac200 = fk20 * fac00(k)
5073  fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)
5074  fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)
5075  fac210 = fk20 * fac10(k)
5076 
5077  fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)
5078  fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)
5079  fac201 = fk21 * fac01(k)
5080  fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)
5081  fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)
5082  fac211 = fk21 * fac11(k)
5083 
5084  do ig = 1, ng07
5085  tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
5086  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
5087  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
5088  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
5089  co2m1 = ka_mco2(ig,jmco2,indm) + fmco2 &
5090  & * (ka_mco2(ig,jmco2p,indm) - ka_mco2(ig,jmco2,indm))
5091  co2m2 = ka_mco2(ig,jmco2,indmp) + fmco2 &
5092  & * (ka_mco2(ig,jmco2p,indmp) - ka_mco2(ig,jmco2,indmp))
5093  absco2 = co2m1 + minorfrac(k) * (co2m2 - co2m1)
5094 
5095  taug(ns07+ig,k) = speccomb &
5096  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
5097  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
5098  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210)) &
5099  & + speccomb1 &
5100  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
5101  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
5102  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211)) &
5103  & + tauself + taufor + adjcolco2*absco2
5104 
5105  fracs(ns07+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
5106  & * (fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
5107  enddo
5108  enddo
5109 
5110 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
5111 
5112 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered
5113 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor
5114 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
5115 
5116  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
5117  temp = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)
5118  ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp
5119  if (ratco2 > 3.0) then
5120  adjfac = 2.0 + (ratco2-2.0)**0.79
5121  adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp
5122  else
5123  adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)
5124  endif
5125 
5126  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(7) + 1
5127  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(7) + 1
5128 
5129  indm = indminor(k)
5130  indmp = indm + 1
5131  ind0p = ind0 + 1
5132  ind1p = ind1 + 1
5133 
5134  do ig = 1, ng07
5135  absco2 = kb_mco2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5136  & * (kb_mco2(ig,indmp) - kb_mco2(ig,indm))
5137 
5138  taug(ns07+ig,k) = colamt(k,3) &
5139  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
5140  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p)) &
5141  & + adjcolco2 * absco2
5142 
5143  fracs(ns07+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
5144  enddo
5145 
5146 ! --- ... empirical modification to code to improve stratospheric cooling rates
5147 ! for o3. revised to apply weighting for g-point reduction in this band.
5148 
5149  taug(ns07+ 6,k) = taug(ns07+ 6,k) * 0.92
5150  taug(ns07+ 7,k) = taug(ns07+ 7,k) * 0.88
5151  taug(ns07+ 8,k) = taug(ns07+ 8,k) * 1.07
5152  taug(ns07+ 9,k) = taug(ns07+ 9,k) * 1.1
5153  taug(ns07+10,k) = taug(ns07+10,k) * 0.99
5154  taug(ns07+11,k) = taug(ns07+11,k) * 0.855
5155  enddo
5156 
5157 ! ..................................
5158  end subroutine taugb07
5159 ! ----------------------------------
5160 
5161 ! ----------------------------------
5162  subroutine taugb08
5163 ! ..................................
5164 
5165 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5166 ! band 8: 1080-1180 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - co2,o3,n2o) !
5167 ! (high key - o3; high minor - co2, n2o) !
5168 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5169 
5170  use module_radlw_kgb08
5171 
5172 ! --- locals:
5173  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
5174  & indm, indmp, ig
5175 
5176  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, absco2, abso3, absn2o, &
5177  & ratco2, adjfac, adjcolco2, temp
5178 !
5179 !===> ... begin here
5180 !
5181 ! --- ... minor gas mapping level:
5182 ! lower - co2, p = 1053.63 mb, t = 294.2 k
5183 ! lower - o3, p = 317.348 mb, t = 240.77 k
5184 ! lower - n2o, p = 706.2720 mb, t= 278.94 k
5185 ! lower - cfc12,cfc11
5186 ! upper - co2, p = 35.1632 mb, t = 223.28 k
5187 ! upper - n2o, p = 8.716e-2 mb, t = 226.03 k
5188 
5189 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
5190 
5191  do k = 1, laytrop
5192  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(8) + 1
5193  ind1 = ( jp(k) *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(8) + 1
5194 
5195  inds = indself(k)
5196  indf = indfor(k)
5197  indm = indminor(k)
5198  ind0p = ind0 + 1
5199  ind1p = ind1 + 1
5200  indsp = inds + 1
5201  indfp = indf + 1
5202  indmp = indm + 1
5203 
5204 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered
5205 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor
5206 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
5207 
5208  temp = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)
5209  ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp
5210  if (ratco2 > 3.0) then
5211  adjfac = 2.0 + (ratco2-2.0)**0.65
5212  adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp
5213  else
5214  adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)
5215  endif
5216 
5217  do ig = 1, ng08
5218  tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
5219  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
5220  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
5221  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
5222  absco2 = (ka_mco2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5223  & * (ka_mco2(ig,indmp) - ka_mco2(ig,indm)))
5224  abso3 = (ka_mo3(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5225  & * (ka_mo3(ig,indmp) - ka_mo3(ig,indm)))
5226  absn2o = (ka_mn2o(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5227  & * (ka_mn2o(ig,indmp) - ka_mn2o(ig,indm)))
5228 
5229  taug(ns08+ig,k) = colamt(k,1) &
5230  & * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p) &
5231  & + fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p)) &
5232  & + tauself+taufor + adjcolco2*absco2 &
5233  & + colamt(k,3)*abso3 + colamt(k,4)*absn2o &
5234  & + wx(k,3)*cfc12(ig) + wx(k,4)*cfc22adj(ig)
5235 
5236  fracs(ns08+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)
5237  enddo
5238  enddo
5239 
5240 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
5241 
5242  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
5243  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(8) + 1
5244  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(8) + 1
5245 
5246  indm = indminor(k)
5247  ind0p = ind0 + 1
5248  ind1p = ind1 + 1
5249  indmp = indm + 1
5250 
5251 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered
5252 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor
5253 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
5254 
5255  temp = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)
5256  ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp
5257  if (ratco2 > 3.0) then
5258  adjfac = 2.0 + (ratco2-2.0)**0.65
5259  adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp
5260  else
5261  adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)
5262  endif
5263 
5264  do ig = 1, ng08
5265  absco2 = (kb_mco2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5266  & * (kb_mco2(ig,indmp) - kb_mco2(ig,indm)))
5267  absn2o = (kb_mn2o(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5268  & * (kb_mn2o(ig,indmp) - kb_mn2o(ig,indm)))
5269 
5270  taug(ns08+ig,k) = colamt(k,3) &
5271  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
5272  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p)) &
5273  & + adjcolco2*absco2 + colamt(k,4)*absn2o &
5274  & + wx(k,3)*cfc12(ig) + wx(k,4)*cfc22adj(ig)
5275 
5276  fracs(ns08+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
5277  enddo
5278  enddo
5279 
5280 ! ..................................
5281  end subroutine taugb08
5282 ! ----------------------------------
5283 
5284 ! ----------------------------------
5285  subroutine taugb09
5286 ! ..................................
5287 
5288 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5289 ! band 9: 1180-1390 cm-1 (low key - h2o,ch4; low minor - n2o) !
5290 ! (high key - ch4; high minor - n2o) !
5291 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5292 
5293  use module_radlw_kgb09
5294 
5295 ! --- locals:
5296  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
5297  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, indm, indmp, &
5298  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jmn2o, jmn2op, &
5299  & jpl, jplp, ig, js, js1
5300 
5301  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, n2om1, n2om2, absn2o, &
5302  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
5303  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
5304  & speccomb_mn2o, specparm_mn2o, specmult_mn2o, fmn2o, &
5305  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
5306  & refrat_planck_a, refrat_m_a, ratn2o, adjfac, adjcoln2o, &
5307  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
5308  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
5309  & p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21, temp
5310 !
5311 !===> ... begin here
5312 !
5313 ! --- ... minor gas mapping level :
5314 ! lower - n2o, p = 706.272 mbar, t = 278.94 k
5315 ! upper - n2o, p = 95.58 mbar, t = 215.7 k
5316 
5317 ! --- ... calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck
5318 ! fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.
5319 
5320  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,9)/chi_mls(6,9) ! P = 212 mb
5321  refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(6,3) ! P = 706.272 mb
5322 
5323 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
5324 
5325  do k = 1, laytrop
5326  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,4,1)*colamt(k,5)
5327  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
5328  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
5329  js = 1 + int(specmult)
5330  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
5331  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(9) + js
5332 
5333  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,4,2)*colamt(k,5)
5334  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
5335  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
5336  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
5337  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
5338  ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(9) + js1
5339 
5340  speccomb_mn2o = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,5)
5341  specparm_mn2o = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mn2o
5342  specmult_mn2o = 8.0 * min(specparm_mn2o, oneminus)
5343  jmn2o = 1 + int(specmult_mn2o)
5344  fmn2o = mod(specmult_mn2o, f_one)
5345 
5346  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,5)
5347  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
5348  specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
5349  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
5350  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
5351 
5352  inds = indself(k)
5353  indf = indfor(k)
5354  indm = indminor(k)
5355  indsp = inds + 1
5356  indfp = indf + 1
5357  indmp = indm + 1
5358  jplp = jpl + 1
5359  jmn2op= jmn2o+ 1
5360 
5361 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of n2o is too great to be considered
5362 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of n2o by an empirical factor
5363 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
5364 
5365  temp = coldry(k) * chi_mls(4,jp(k)+1)
5366  ratn2o = colamt(k,4) / temp
5367  if (ratn2o > 1.5) then
5368  adjfac = 0.5 + (ratn2o-0.5)**0.65
5369  adjcoln2o = adjfac * temp
5370  else
5371  adjcoln2o = colamt(k,4)
5372  endif
5373 
5374  if (specparm < 0.125 .and. specparm1 < 0.125) then
5375  p0 = fs - f_one
5376  p40 = p0**4
5377  fk00 = p40
5378  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
5379  fk20 = p0 + p40
5380 
5381  p1 = fs1 - f_one
5382  p41 = p1**4
5383  fk01 = p41
5384  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
5385  fk21 = p1 + p41
5386 
5387  id000 = ind0
5388  id010 = ind0 + 9
5389  id100 = ind0 + 1
5390  id110 = ind0 +10
5391  id200 = ind0 + 2
5392  id210 = ind0 +11
5393 
5394  id001 = ind1
5395  id011 = ind1 + 9
5396  id101 = ind1 + 1
5397  id111 = ind1 +10
5398  id201 = ind1 + 2
5399  id211 = ind1 +11
5400 
5401  elseif (specparm > 0.875 .and. specparm1 > 0.875) then
5402  p0 = -fs
5403  p40 = p0**4
5404  fk00 = p40
5405  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
5406  fk20 = p0 + p40
5407 
5408  p1 = -fs1
5409  p41 = p1**4
5410  fk01 = p41
5411  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
5412  fk21 = p1 + p41
5413 
5414  id000 = ind0 + 1
5415  id010 = ind0 +10
5416  id100 = ind0
5417  id110 = ind0 + 9
5418  id200 = ind0 - 1
5419  id210 = ind0 + 8
5420 
5421  id001 = ind1 + 1
5422  id011 = ind1 +10
5423  id101 = ind1
5424  id111 = ind1 + 9
5425  id201 = ind1 - 1
5426  id211 = ind1 + 8
5427  else
5428  fk00 = f_one - fs
5429  fk10 = fs
5430  fk20 = f_zero
5431 
5432  fk01 = f_one - fs1
5433  fk11 = fs1
5434  fk21 = f_zero
5435 
5436  id000 = ind0
5437  id010 = ind0 + 9
5438  id100 = ind0 + 1
5439  id110 = ind0 +10
5440  id200 = ind0
5441  id210 = ind0
5442 
5443  id001 = ind1
5444  id011 = ind1 + 9
5445  id101 = ind1 + 1
5446  id111 = ind1 +10
5447  id201 = ind1
5448  id211 = ind1
5449  endif
5450 
5451  fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)
5452  fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)
5453  fac200 = fk20 * fac00(k)
5454  fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)
5455  fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)
5456  fac210 = fk20 * fac10(k)
5457 
5458  fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)
5459  fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)
5460  fac201 = fk21 * fac01(k)
5461  fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)
5462  fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)
5463  fac211 = fk21 * fac11(k)
5464 
5465  do ig = 1, ng09
5466  tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
5467  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
5468  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
5469  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
5470  n2om1 = ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indm) + fmn2o &
5471  & * (ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2op,indm) - ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indm))
5472  n2om2 = ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indmp) + fmn2o &
5473  & * (ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2op,indmp) - ka_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indmp))
5474  absn2o = n2om1 + minorfrac(k) * (n2om2 - n2om1)
5475 
5476  taug(ns09+ig,k) = speccomb &
5477  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
5478  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
5479  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210)) &
5480  & + speccomb1 &
5481  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
5482  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
5483  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211)) &
5484  & + tauself + taufor + adjcoln2o*absn2o
5485 
5486  fracs(ns09+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
5487  & * (fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
5488  enddo
5489  enddo
5490 
5491 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
5492 
5493  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
5494  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(9) + 1
5495  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(9) + 1
5496 
5497  indm = indminor(k)
5498  ind0p = ind0 + 1
5499  ind1p = ind1 + 1
5500  indmp = indm + 1
5501 
5502 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of n2o is too great to be considered
5503 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of n2o by an empirical factor
5504 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
5505 
5506  temp = coldry(k) * chi_mls(4,jp(k)+1)
5507  ratn2o = colamt(k,4) / temp
5508  if (ratn2o > 1.5) then
5509  adjfac = 0.5 + (ratn2o - 0.5)**0.65
5510  adjcoln2o = adjfac * temp
5511  else
5512  adjcoln2o = colamt(k,4)
5513  endif
5514 
5515  do ig = 1, ng09
5516  absn2o = kb_mn2o(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5517  & * (kb_mn2o(ig,indmp) - kb_mn2o(ig,indm))
5518 
5519  taug(ns09+ig,k) = colamt(k,5) &
5520  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
5521  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p)) &
5522  & + adjcoln2o*absn2o
5523 
5524  fracs(ns09+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
5525  enddo
5526  enddo
5527 
5528 ! ..................................
5529  end subroutine taugb09
5530 ! ----------------------------------
5531 
5532 ! ----------------------------------
5533  subroutine taugb10
5534 ! ..................................
5535 
5536 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5537 ! band 10: 1390-1480 cm-1 (low key - h2o; high key - h2o) !
5538 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5539 
5540  use module_radlw_kgb10
5541 
5542 ! --- locals:
5543  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
5544  & ig
5545 
5546  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor
5547 !
5548 !===> ... begin here
5549 !
5550 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
5551 
5552  do k = 1, laytrop
5553  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(10) + 1
5554  ind1 = ( jp(k) *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(10) + 1
5555 
5556  inds = indself(k)
5557  indf = indfor(k)
5558  ind0p = ind0 + 1
5559  ind1p = ind1 + 1
5560  indsp = inds + 1
5561  indfp = indf + 1
5562 
5563  do ig = 1, ng10
5564  tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
5565  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
5566  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
5567  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
5568 
5569  taug(ns10+ig,k) = colamt(k,1) &
5570  & * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p) &
5571  & + fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p)) &
5572  & + tauself + taufor
5573 
5574  fracs(ns10+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)
5575  enddo
5576  enddo
5577 
5578 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
5579 
5580  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
5581  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(10) + 1
5582  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(10) + 1
5583 
5584  indf = indfor(k)
5585  ind0p = ind0 + 1
5586  ind1p = ind1 + 1
5587  indfp = indf + 1
5588 
5589  do ig = 1, ng10
5590  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
5591  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
5592 
5593  taug(ns10+ig,k) = colamt(k,1) &
5594  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
5595  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p)) &
5596  & + taufor
5597 
5598  fracs(ns10+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
5599  enddo
5600  enddo
5601 
5602 ! ..................................
5603  end subroutine taugb10
5604 ! ----------------------------------
5605 
5606 ! ----------------------------------
5607  subroutine taugb11
5608 ! ..................................
5609 
5610 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5611 ! band 11: 1480-1800 cm-1 (low - h2o; low minor - o2) !
5612 ! (high key - h2o; high minor - o2) !
5613 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5614 
5615  use module_radlw_kgb11
5616 
5617 ! --- locals:
5618  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
5619  & indm, indmp, ig
5620 
5621  real (kind=kind_phys) :: scaleo2, tauself, taufor, tauo2
5622 !
5623 !===> ... begin here
5624 !
5625 ! --- ... minor gas mapping level :
5626 ! lower - o2, p = 706.2720 mbar, t = 278.94 k
5627 ! upper - o2, p = 4.758820 mbarm t = 250.85 k
5628 
5629 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
5630 
5631  do k = 1, laytrop
5632  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(11) + 1
5633  ind1 = ( jp(k) *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(11) + 1
5634 
5635  inds = indself(k)
5636  indf = indfor(k)
5637  indm = indminor(k)
5638  ind0p = ind0 + 1
5639  ind1p = ind1 + 1
5640  indsp = inds + 1
5641  indfp = indf + 1
5642  indmp = indm + 1
5643 
5644  scaleo2 = colamt(k,6) * scaleminor(k)
5645 
5646  do ig = 1, ng11
5647  tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
5648  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
5649  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
5650  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
5651  tauo2 = scaleo2 * (ka_mo2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5652  & * (ka_mo2(ig,indmp) - ka_mo2(ig,indm)))
5653 
5654  taug(ns11+ig,k) = colamt(k,1) &
5655  & * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p) &
5656  & + fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p)) &
5657  & + tauself + taufor + tauo2
5658 
5659  fracs(ns11+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)
5660  enddo
5661  enddo
5662 
5663 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
5664 
5665  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
5666  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(11) + 1
5667  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(11) + 1
5668 
5669  indf = indfor(k)
5670  indm = indminor(k)
5671  ind0p = ind0 + 1
5672  ind1p = ind1 + 1
5673  indfp = indf + 1
5674  indmp = indm + 1
5675 
5676  scaleo2 = colamt(k,6) * scaleminor(k)
5677 
5678  do ig = 1, ng11
5679  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
5680  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
5681  tauo2 = scaleo2 * (kb_mo2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
5682  & * (kb_mo2(ig,indmp) - kb_mo2(ig,indm)))
5683 
5684  taug(ns11+ig,k) = colamt(k,1) &
5685  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
5686  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p)) &
5687  & + taufor + tauo2
5688 
5689  fracs(ns11+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
5690  enddo
5691  enddo
5692 
5693 ! ..................................
5694  end subroutine taugb11
5695 ! ----------------------------------
5696 
5697 ! ----------------------------------
5698  subroutine taugb12
5699 ! ..................................
5700 
5701 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5702 ! band 12: 1800-2080 cm-1 (low - h2o,co2; high - nothing) !
5703 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5704 
5705  use module_radlw_kgb12
5706 
5707 ! --- locals:
5708  integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, jpl, jplp, &
5709  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, ig, js, js1, &
5710  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211
5711 
5712  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, refrat_planck_a, &
5713  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
5714  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
5715  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
5716  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
5717  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
5718  & p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21
5719 !
5720 !===> ... begin here
5721 !
5722 ! --- ... calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck
5723 ! fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.
5724 
5725  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,10)/chi_mls(2,10) ! P = 174.164 mb
5726 
5727 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
5728 
5729  do k = 1, laytrop
5730  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,1)*colamt(k,2)
5731  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
5732  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
5733  js = 1 + int(specmult)
5734  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
5735  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(12) + js
5736 
5737  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,2)*colamt(k,2)
5738  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
5739  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
5740  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
5741  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
5742  ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(12) + js1
5743 
5744  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,2)
5745  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
5746  if (specparm_planck >= oneminus) specparm_planck=oneminus
5747  specmult_planck = 8.0 * specparm_planck
5748  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
5749  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
5750 
5751  inds = indself(k)
5752  indf = indfor(k)
5753  indsp = inds + 1
5754  indfp = indf + 1
5755  jplp = jpl + 1
5756 
5757  if (specparm < 0.125 .and. specparm1 < 0.125) then
5758  p0 = fs - f_one
5759  p40 = p0**4
5760  fk00 = p40
5761  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
5762  fk20 = p0 + p40
5763 
5764  p1 = fs1 - f_one
5765  p41 = p1**4
5766  fk01 = p41
5767  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
5768  fk21 = p1 + p41
5769 
5770  id000 = ind0
5771  id010 = ind0 + 9
5772  id100 = ind0 + 1
5773  id110 = ind0 +10
5774  id200 = ind0 + 2
5775  id210 = ind0 +11
5776 
5777  id001 = ind1
5778  id011 = ind1 + 9
5779  id101 = ind1 + 1
5780  id111 = ind1 +10
5781  id201 = ind1 + 2
5782  id211 = ind1 +11
5783  elseif (specparm > 0.875 .and. specparm1 > 0.875) then
5784  p0 = -fs
5785  p40 = p0**4
5786  fk00 = p40
5787  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
5788  fk20 = p0 + p40
5789 
5790  p1 = -fs1
5791  p41 = p1**4
5792  fk01 = p41
5793  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
5794  fk21 = p1 + p41
5795 
5796  id000 = ind0 + 1
5797  id010 = ind0 +10
5798  id100 = ind0
5799  id110 = ind0 + 9
5800  id200 = ind0 - 1
5801  id210 = ind0 + 8
5802 
5803  id001 = ind1 + 1
5804  id011 = ind1 +10
5805  id101 = ind1
5806  id111 = ind1 + 9
5807  id201 = ind1 - 1
5808  id211 = ind1 + 8
5809  else
5810  fk00 = f_one - fs
5811  fk10 = fs
5812  fk20 = f_zero
5813 
5814  fk01 = f_one - fs1
5815  fk11 = fs1
5816  fk21 = f_zero
5817 
5818  id000 = ind0
5819  id010 = ind0 + 9
5820  id100 = ind0 + 1
5821  id110 = ind0 +10
5822  id200 = ind0
5823  id210 = ind0
5824 
5825  id001 = ind1
5826  id011 = ind1 + 9
5827  id101 = ind1 + 1
5828  id111 = ind1 +10
5829  id201 = ind1
5830  id211 = ind1
5831  endif
5832 
5833  fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)
5834  fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)
5835  fac200 = fk20 * fac00(k)
5836  fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)
5837  fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)
5838  fac210 = fk20 * fac10(k)
5839 
5840  fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)
5841  fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)
5842  fac201 = fk21 * fac01(k)
5843  fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)
5844  fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)
5845  fac211 = fk21 * fac11(k)
5846 
5847  do ig = 1, ng12
5848  tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
5849  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
5850  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
5851  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
5852 
5853  taug(ns12+ig,k) = speccomb &
5854  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
5855  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
5856  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210)) &
5857  & + speccomb1 &
5858  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
5859  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
5860  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211)) &
5861  & + tauself + taufor
5862 
5863  fracs(ns12+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
5864  & *(fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
5865  enddo
5866  enddo
5867 
5868 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
5869 
5870  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
5871  do ig = 1, ng12
5872  taug(ns12+ig,k) = f_zero
5873  fracs(ns12+ig,k) = f_zero
5874  enddo
5875  enddo
5876 
5877 ! ..................................
5878  end subroutine taugb12
5879 ! ----------------------------------
5880 
5881 ! ----------------------------------
5882  subroutine taugb13
5883 ! ..................................
5884 
5885 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5886 ! band 13: 2080-2250 cm-1 (low key-h2o,n2o; high minor-o3 minor) !
5887 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
5888 
5889  use module_radlw_kgb13
5890 
5891 ! --- locals:
5892  integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, indm, indmp, &
5893  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, jmco2, jpl, &
5894  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jmco2p, jplp, &
5895  & jmco, jmcop, ig, js, js1
5896 
5897  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, co2m1, co2m2, absco2, &
5898  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
5899  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
5900  & speccomb_mco2, specparm_mco2, specmult_mco2, fmco2, &
5901  & speccomb_mco, specparm_mco, specmult_mco, fmco, &
5902  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
5903  & refrat_planck_a, refrat_m_a, refrat_m_a3, ratco2, &
5904  & adjfac, adjcolco2, com1, com2, absco, abso3, &
5905  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
5906  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
5907  & p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21, temp
5908 !
5909 !===> ... begin here
5910 !
5911 ! --- ... minor gas mapping levels :
5912 ! lower - co2, p = 1053.63 mb, t = 294.2 k
5913 ! lower - co, p = 706 mb, t = 278.94 k
5914 ! upper - o3, p = 95.5835 mb, t = 215.7 k
5915 
5916 ! --- ... calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck
5917 ! fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.
5918 
5919  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,5)/chi_mls(4,5) ! P = 473.420 mb (Level 5)
5920  refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,1)/chi_mls(4,1) ! P = 1053. (Level 1)
5921  refrat_m_a3 = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(4,3) ! P = 706. (Level 3)
5922 
5923 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
5924 
5925  do k = 1, laytrop
5926  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,3,1)*colamt(k,4)
5927  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
5928  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
5929  js = 1 + int(specmult)
5930  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
5931  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(13) + js
5932 
5933  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,3,2)*colamt(k,4)
5934  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
5935  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
5936  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
5937  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
5938  ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(13) + js1
5939 
5940  speccomb_mco2 = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,4)
5941  specparm_mco2 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mco2
5942  specmult_mco2 = 8.0 * min(specparm_mco2, oneminus)
5943  jmco2 = 1 + int(specmult_mco2)
5944  fmco2 = mod(specmult_mco2, f_one)
5945 
5946 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered
5947 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor
5948 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
5949 
5950  speccomb_mco = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a3*colamt(k,4)
5951  specparm_mco = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mco
5952  specmult_mco = 8.0 * min(specparm_mco, oneminus)
5953  jmco = 1 + int(specmult_mco)
5954  fmco = mod(specmult_mco, f_one)
5955 
5956  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,4)
5957  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
5958  specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
5959  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
5960  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
5961 
5962  inds = indself(k)
5963  indf = indfor(k)
5964  indm = indminor(k)
5965  indsp = inds + 1
5966  indfp = indf + 1
5967  indmp = indm + 1
5968  jplp = jpl + 1
5969  jmco2p= jmco2+ 1
5970  jmcop = jmco + 1
5971 
5972 ! --- ... in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered
5973 ! a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor
5974 ! to obtain the proper contribution.
5975 
5976  temp = coldry(k) * 3.55e-4
5977  ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp
5978  if (ratco2 > 3.0) then
5979  adjfac = 2.0 + (ratco2-2.0)**0.68
5980  adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp
5981  else
5982  adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)
5983  endif
5984 
5985  if (specparm < 0.125 .and. specparm1 < 0.125) then
5986  p0 = fs - f_one
5987  p40 = p0**4
5988  fk00 = p40
5989  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
5990  fk20 = p0 + p40
5991 
5992  p1 = fs1 - f_one
5993  p41 = p1**4
5994  fk01 = p41
5995  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
5996  fk21 = p1 + p41
5997 
5998  id000 = ind0
5999  id010 = ind0 + 9
6000  id100 = ind0 + 1
6001  id110 = ind0 +10
6002  id200 = ind0 + 2
6003  id210 = ind0 +11
6004 
6005  id001 = ind1
6006  id011 = ind1 + 9
6007  id101 = ind1 + 1
6008  id111 = ind1 +10
6009  id201 = ind1 + 2
6010  id211 = ind1 +11
6011  elseif (specparm > 0.875 .and. specparm1 > 0.875) then
6012  p0 = -fs
6013  p40 = p0**4
6014  fk00 = p40
6015  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
6016  fk20 = p0 + p40
6017 
6018  p1 = -fs1
6019  p41 = p1**4
6020  fk01 = p41
6021  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
6022  fk21 = p1 + p41
6023 
6024  id000 = ind0 + 1
6025  id010 = ind0 +10
6026  id100 = ind0
6027  id110 = ind0 + 9
6028  id200 = ind0 - 1
6029  id210 = ind0 + 8
6030 
6031  id001 = ind1 + 1
6032  id011 = ind1 +10
6033  id101 = ind1
6034  id111 = ind1 + 9
6035  id201 = ind1 - 1
6036  id211 = ind1 + 8
6037  else
6038  fk00 = f_one - fs
6039  fk10 = fs
6040  fk20 = f_zero
6041 
6042  fk01 = f_one - fs1
6043  fk11 = fs1
6044  fk21 = f_zero
6045 
6046  id000 = ind0
6047  id010 = ind0 + 9
6048  id100 = ind0 + 1
6049  id110 = ind0 +10
6050  id200 = ind0
6051  id210 = ind0
6052 
6053  id001 = ind1
6054  id011 = ind1 + 9
6055  id101 = ind1 + 1
6056  id111 = ind1 +10
6057  id201 = ind1
6058  id211 = ind1
6059  endif
6060 
6061  fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)
6062  fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)
6063  fac200 = fk20 * fac00(k)
6064  fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)
6065  fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)
6066  fac210 = fk20 * fac10(k)
6067 
6068  fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)
6069  fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)
6070  fac201 = fk21 * fac01(k)
6071  fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)
6072  fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)
6073  fac211 = fk21 * fac11(k)
6074 
6075  do ig = 1, ng13
6076  tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
6077  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
6078  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
6079  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
6080  co2m1 = ka_mco2(ig,jmco2,indm) + fmco2 &
6081  & * (ka_mco2(ig,jmco2p,indm) - ka_mco2(ig,jmco2,indm))
6082  co2m2 = ka_mco2(ig,jmco2,indmp) + fmco2 &
6083  & * (ka_mco2(ig,jmco2p,indmp) - ka_mco2(ig,jmco2,indmp))
6084  absco2 = co2m1 + minorfrac(k) * (co2m2 - co2m1)
6085  com1 = ka_mco(ig,jmco,indm) + fmco &
6086  & * (ka_mco(ig,jmcop,indm) - ka_mco(ig,jmco,indm))
6087  com2 = ka_mco(ig,jmco,indmp) + fmco &
6088  & * (ka_mco(ig,jmcop,indmp) - ka_mco(ig,jmco,indmp))
6089  absco = com1 + minorfrac(k) * (com2 - com1)
6090 
6091  taug(ns13+ig,k) = speccomb &
6092  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
6093  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
6094  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210)) &
6095  & + speccomb1 &
6096  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
6097  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
6098  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211)) &
6099  & + tauself + taufor + adjcolco2*absco2 &
6100  & + colamt(k,7)*absco
6101 
6102  fracs(ns13+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
6103  & * (fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
6104  enddo
6105  enddo
6106 
6107 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
6108 
6109  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
6110  indm = indminor(k)
6111  indmp = indm + 1
6112 
6113  do ig = 1, ng13
6114  abso3 = kb_mo3(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k) &
6115  & * (kb_mo3(ig,indmp) - kb_mo3(ig,indm))
6116 
6117  taug(ns13+ig,k) = colamt(k,3)*abso3
6118 
6119  fracs(ns13+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
6120  enddo
6121  enddo
6122 
6123 ! ..................................
6124  end subroutine taugb13
6125 ! ----------------------------------
6126 
6127 ! ----------------------------------
6128  subroutine taugb14
6129 ! ..................................
6130 
6131 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
6132 ! band 14: 2250-2380 cm-1 (low - co2; high - co2) !
6133 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
6134 
6135  use module_radlw_kgb14
6136 
6137 ! --- locals:
6138  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
6139  & ig
6140 
6141  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor
6142 !
6143 !===> ... begin here
6144 !
6145 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
6146 
6147  do k = 1, laytrop
6148  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(14) + 1
6149  ind1 = ( jp(k) *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(14) + 1
6150 
6151  inds = indself(k)
6152  indf = indfor(k)
6153  ind0p = ind0 + 1
6154  ind1p = ind1 + 1
6155  indsp = inds + 1
6156  indfp = indf + 1
6157 
6158  do ig = 1, ng14
6159  tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
6160  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
6161  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
6162  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
6163 
6164  taug(ns14+ig,k) = colamt(k,2) &
6165  & * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p) &
6166  & + fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p)) &
6167  & + tauself + taufor
6168 
6169  fracs(ns14+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)
6170  enddo
6171  enddo
6172 
6173 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
6174 
6175  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
6176  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(14) + 1
6177  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(14) + 1
6178 
6179  ind0p = ind0 + 1
6180  ind1p = ind1 + 1
6181 
6182  do ig = 1, ng14
6183  taug(ns14+ig,k) = colamt(k,2) &
6184  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
6185  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p))
6186 
6187  fracs(ns14+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
6188  enddo
6189  enddo
6190 
6191 ! ..................................
6192  end subroutine taugb14
6193 ! ----------------------------------
6194 
6195 ! ----------------------------------
6196  subroutine taugb15
6197 ! ..................................
6198 
6199 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
6200 ! band 15: 2380-2600 cm-1 (low - n2o,co2; low minor - n2) !
6201 ! (high - nothing) !
6202 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
6203 
6204  use module_radlw_kgb15
6205 
6206 ! --- locals:
6207  integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, indm, indmp, &
6208  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, jpl, jplp, &
6209  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jmn2, jmn2p, &
6210  & ig, js, js1
6211 
6212  real (kind=kind_phys) :: scalen2, tauself, taufor, &
6213  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
6214  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
6215  & speccomb_mn2, specparm_mn2, specmult_mn2, fmn2, &
6216  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
6217  & refrat_planck_a, refrat_m_a, n2m1, n2m2, taun2, &
6218  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
6219  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
6220  & p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21
6221 !
6222 !===> ... begin here
6223 !
6224 ! --- ... minor gas mapping level :
6225 ! lower - nitrogen continuum, P = 1053., T = 294.
6226 
6227 ! --- ... calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck
6228 ! fraction in lower atmosphere.
6229 
6230  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(4,1)/chi_mls(2,1) ! P = 1053. mb (Level 1)
6231  refrat_m_a = chi_mls(4,1)/chi_mls(2,1) ! P = 1053. mb
6232 
6233 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
6234 
6235  do k = 1, laytrop
6236  speccomb = colamt(k,4) + rfrate(k,5,1)*colamt(k,2)
6237  specparm = colamt(k,4) / speccomb
6238  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
6239  js = 1 + int(specmult)
6240  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
6241  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(15) + js
6242 
6243  speccomb1 = colamt(k,4) + rfrate(k,5,2)*colamt(k,2)
6244  specparm1 = colamt(k,4) / speccomb1
6245  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
6246  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
6247  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
6248  ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(15) + js1
6249 
6250  speccomb_mn2 = colamt(k,4) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,2)
6251  specparm_mn2 = colamt(k,4) / speccomb_mn2
6252  specmult_mn2 = 8.0 * min(specparm_mn2, oneminus)
6253  jmn2 = 1 + int(specmult_mn2)
6254  fmn2 = mod(specmult_mn2, f_one)
6255 
6256  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,4) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,2)
6257  specparm_planck = colamt(k,4) / speccomb_planck
6258  specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
6259  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
6260  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
6261 
6262  scalen2 = colbrd(k) * scaleminor(k)
6263 
6264  inds = indself(k)
6265  indf = indfor(k)
6266  indm = indminor(k)
6267  indsp = inds + 1
6268  indfp = indf + 1
6269  indmp = indm + 1
6270  jplp = jpl + 1
6271  jmn2p = jmn2 + 1
6272 
6273  if (specparm < 0.125 .and. specparm1 < 0.125) then
6274  p0 = fs - f_one
6275  p40 = p0**4
6276  fk00 = p40
6277  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
6278  fk20 = p0 + p40
6279 
6280  p1 = fs1 - f_one
6281  p41 = p1**4
6282  fk01 = p41
6283  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
6284  fk21 = p1 + p41
6285 
6286  id000 = ind0
6287  id010 = ind0 + 9
6288  id100 = ind0 + 1
6289  id110 = ind0 +10
6290  id200 = ind0 + 2
6291  id210 = ind0 +11
6292 
6293  id001 = ind1
6294  id011 = ind1 + 9
6295  id101 = ind1 + 1
6296  id111 = ind1 +10
6297  id201 = ind1 + 2
6298  id211 = ind1 +11
6299  elseif (specparm > 0.875 .and. specparm1 > 0.875) then
6300  p0 = -fs
6301  p40 = p0**4
6302  fk00 = p40
6303  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
6304  fk20 = p0 + p40
6305 
6306  p1 = -fs1
6307  p41 = p1**4
6308  fk01 = p41
6309  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
6310  fk21 = p1 + p41
6311 
6312  id000 = ind0 + 1
6313  id010 = ind0 +10
6314  id100 = ind0
6315  id110 = ind0 + 9
6316  id200 = ind0 - 1
6317  id210 = ind0 + 8
6318 
6319  id001 = ind1 + 1
6320  id011 = ind1 +10
6321  id101 = ind1
6322  id111 = ind1 + 9
6323  id201 = ind1 - 1
6324  id211 = ind1 + 8
6325  else
6326  fk00 = f_one - fs
6327  fk10 = fs
6328  fk20 = f_zero
6329 
6330  fk01 = f_one - fs1
6331  fk11 = fs1
6332  fk21 = f_zero
6333 
6334  id000 = ind0
6335  id010 = ind0 + 9
6336  id100 = ind0 + 1
6337  id110 = ind0 +10
6338  id200 = ind0
6339  id210 = ind0
6340 
6341  id001 = ind1
6342  id011 = ind1 + 9
6343  id101 = ind1 + 1
6344  id111 = ind1 +10
6345  id201 = ind1
6346  id211 = ind1
6347  endif
6348 
6349  fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)
6350  fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)
6351  fac200 = fk20 * fac00(k)
6352  fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)
6353  fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)
6354  fac210 = fk20 * fac10(k)
6355 
6356  fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)
6357  fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)
6358  fac201 = fk21 * fac01(k)
6359  fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)
6360  fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)
6361  fac211 = fk21 * fac11(k)
6362 
6363  do ig = 1, ng15
6364  tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
6365  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
6366  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
6367  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
6368  n2m1 = ka_mn2(ig,jmn2,indm) + fmn2 &
6369  & * (ka_mn2(ig,jmn2p,indm) - ka_mn2(ig,jmn2,indm))
6370  n2m2 = ka_mn2(ig,jmn2,indmp) + fmn2 &
6371  & * (ka_mn2(ig,jmn2p,indmp) - ka_mn2(ig,jmn2,indmp))
6372  taun2 = scalen2 * (n2m1 + minorfrac(k) * (n2m2 - n2m1))
6373 
6374  taug(ns15+ig,k) = speccomb &
6375  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
6376  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
6377  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210)) &
6378  & + speccomb1 &
6379  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
6380  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
6381  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211)) &
6382  & + tauself + taufor + taun2
6383 
6384  fracs(ns15+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
6385  & * (fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
6386  enddo
6387  enddo
6388 
6389 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
6390 
6391  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
6392  do ig = 1, ng15
6393  taug(ns15+ig,k) = f_zero
6394 
6395  fracs(ns15+ig,k) = f_zero
6396  enddo
6397  enddo
6398 
6399 ! ..................................
6400  end subroutine taugb15
6401 ! ----------------------------------
6402 
6403 ! ----------------------------------
6404  subroutine taugb16
6405 ! ..................................
6406 
6407 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
6408 ! band 16: 2600-3250 cm-1 (low key- h2o,ch4; high key - ch4) !
6409 ! ------------------------------------------------------------------ !
6410 
6411  use module_radlw_kgb16
6412 
6413 ! --- locals:
6414  integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &
6415  & id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, jpl, jplp, &
6416  & id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, ig, js, js1
6417 
6418  real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, refrat_planck_a, &
6419  & speccomb, specparm, specmult, fs, &
6420  & speccomb1, specparm1, specmult1, fs1, &
6421  & speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl, &
6422  & fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210, &
6423  & fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211, &
6424  & p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21
6425 !
6426 !===> ... begin here
6427 !
6428 ! --- ... calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck
6429 ! fraction in lower atmosphere.
6430 
6431  refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,6)/chi_mls(6,6) ! P = 387. mb (Level 6)
6432 
6433 ! --- ... lower atmosphere loop
6434 
6435  do k = 1, laytrop
6436  speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,4,1)*colamt(k,5)
6437  specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb
6438  specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)
6439  js = 1 + int(specmult)
6440  fs = mod(specmult, f_one)
6441  ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(16) + js
6442 
6443  speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,4,2)*colamt(k,5)
6444  specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1
6445  specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)
6446  js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)
6447  fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)
6448  ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(16) + js1
6449 
6450  speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,5)
6451  specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck
6452  specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)
6453  jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)
6454  fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)
6455 
6456  inds = indself(k)
6457  indf = indfor(k)
6458  indsp = inds + 1
6459  indfp = indf + 1
6460  jplp = jpl + 1
6461 
6462  if (specparm < 0.125 .and. specparm1 < 0.125) then
6463  p0 = fs - f_one
6464  p40 = p0**4
6465  fk00 = p40
6466  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
6467  fk20 = p0 + p40
6468 
6469  p1 = fs1 - f_one
6470  p41 = p1**4
6471  fk01 = p41
6472  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
6473  fk21 = p1 + p41
6474 
6475  id000 = ind0
6476  id010 = ind0 + 9
6477  id100 = ind0 + 1
6478  id110 = ind0 +10
6479  id200 = ind0 + 2
6480  id210 = ind0 +11
6481 
6482  id001 = ind1
6483  id011 = ind1 + 9
6484  id101 = ind1 + 1
6485  id111 = ind1 +10
6486  id201 = ind1 + 2
6487  id211 = ind1 +11
6488  elseif (specparm > 0.875 .and. specparm1 > 0.875) then
6489  p0 = -fs
6490  p40 = p0**4
6491  fk00 = p40
6492  fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40
6493  fk20 = p0 + p40
6494 
6495  p1 = -fs1
6496  p41 = p1**4
6497  fk01 = p41
6498  fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41
6499  fk21 = p1 + p41
6500 
6501  id000 = ind0 + 1
6502  id010 = ind0 +10
6503  id100 = ind0
6504  id110 = ind0 + 9
6505  id200 = ind0 - 1
6506  id210 = ind0 + 8
6507 
6508  id001 = ind1 + 1
6509  id011 = ind1 +10
6510  id101 = ind1
6511  id111 = ind1 + 9
6512  id201 = ind1 - 1
6513  id211 = ind1 + 8
6514  else
6515  fk00 = f_one - fs
6516  fk10 = fs
6517  fk20 = f_zero
6518 
6519  fk01 = f_one - fs1
6520  fk11 = fs1
6521  fk21 = f_zero
6522 
6523  id000 = ind0
6524  id010 = ind0 + 9
6525  id100 = ind0 + 1
6526  id110 = ind0 +10
6527  id200 = ind0
6528  id210 = ind0
6529 
6530  id001 = ind1
6531  id011 = ind1 + 9
6532  id101 = ind1 + 1
6533  id111 = ind1 +10
6534  id201 = ind1
6535  id211 = ind1
6536  endif
6537 
6538  fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)
6539  fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)
6540  fac200 = fk20 * fac00(k)
6541  fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)
6542  fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)
6543  fac210 = fk20 * fac10(k)
6544 
6545  fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)
6546  fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)
6547  fac201 = fk21 * fac01(k)
6548  fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)
6549  fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)
6550  fac211 = fk21 * fac11(k)
6551 
6552  do ig = 1, ng16
6553  tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k) &
6554  & * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))
6555  taufor = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k) &
6556  & * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))
6557 
6558  taug(ns16+ig,k) = speccomb &
6559  & * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010) &
6560  & + fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110) &
6561  & + fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210)) &
6562  & + speccomb1 &
6563  & * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011) &
6564  & + fac101*absa(ig,id101) + fac111*absa(ig,id111) &
6565  & + fac201*absa(ig,id201) + fac211*absa(ig,id211)) &
6566  & + tauself + taufor
6567 
6568  fracs(ns16+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl &
6569  & * (fracrefa(ig,jplp) - fracrefa(ig,jpl))
6570  enddo
6571  enddo
6572 
6573 ! --- ... upper atmosphere loop
6574 
6575  do k = laytrop+1, nlay
6576  ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspb(16) + 1
6577  ind1 = ((jp(k)-12)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspb(16) + 1
6578 
6579  ind0p = ind0 + 1
6580  ind1p = ind1 + 1
6581 
6582  do ig = 1, ng16
6583  taug(ns16+ig,k) = colamt(k,5) &
6584  & * (fac00(k)*absb(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absb(ig,ind0p) &
6585  & + fac01(k)*absb(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absb(ig,ind1p))
6586 
6587  fracs(ns16+ig,k) = fracrefb(ig)
6588  enddo
6589  enddo
6590 
6591 ! ..................................
6592  end subroutine taugb16
6593 ! ----------------------------------
6594 
6595 ! ..................................
6596  end subroutine taumol
6597 !-----------------------------------
6598 
6599 
6600 !
6601 !........................................!
6602  end module module_radlw_main !
6603 !========================================!
module_radlw_kgb05::forref
real(kind=kind_phys), dimension(ng05, mfr05), public forref

module_radlw_cldprlw::absice3
real(kind=kind_phys), dimension(46, nbands) absice3
for iflagice = 3, absice3 are the ice water absorption coefficients used for fu parameterization. particle size 5 - 140 micron in increments of 3 microns. units = m2/g. hexagonal ice particle parameterization absorption units (abs coef/iwc): [(m^-1)/(g m^-3)]
